00069 double logtwo(double value)
00070 {
00071         return(log(value)/log(2.0));
00072 }

00074 //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00075 
00076 double antiLog(double value)
00077 {
00078         return(pow(2.0, value));

00081 //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00082 
00083 double getDegreeOfFreedom(int nProbeSet)
00084 {
00085         double df = 0.7 * (nProbeSet - 1);
00086         if (df < 1.0f)
00087         {
00088                 df = 1;
00089         }
00090 
00091         return df;
00092 }

00094 //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00095 
00096 float vGetT(const int nAtoms, const vector<float> & tTable, float level) 
00097 {
00098         float t = 0.0f;
00099         if (nAtoms == 0) {
00100                 return t;
00101         }
00102         else if (nAtoms <= (int) tTable.size()) {
00103                 t = tTable[nAtoms - 1];
00104         }
00105         else {
00106                 double degreeF = 0.7 * (nAtoms - 1);
00107                 t = (float)tCDFinversed(level, degreeF);
00108         }
00109         return t;
00110 }

00112 //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00113 
00114 int SortFloatsAscending(const void *elem1, const void *elem2)
00115 {
00116         float v1 = *(float *) elem1;
00117         float v2 = *(float *) elem2;
00118 
00119         if (v1 > v2)
00120                 return 1;
00121         else if (v2 > v1)
00122                 return -1;
00123         else
00124                 return 0;
00125 }

00127 //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00128 
00129 float computeSquaredDistance(float x1, float y1, float x2, float y2)
00130 {
00131         float diffx = x1 - x2;
00132         float diffy = y1 - y2;
00133         return (float) ( diffx * diffx + diffy * diffy );
00134 }
00135 
00136 //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00137 
00138 float ComputeWeightAtXY(float x, float y, float centerX, float centerY, float smoothFactor)
00139 {
00140         return 1.0f / (computeSquaredDistance(x , y, centerX, centerY) + smoothFactor);
00141 }

00143 //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00144 
00145 float trimmedInterpolation(float bwGM, float bLow, float bHigh, float left, float right)
00146 {
00147         float x = left;
00148         if (bwGM >= bHigh)
00149         {
00150                 x = right;
00151         }
00152         else if (bwGM > bLow) 
00153         {
00154                 float wG = (bwGM - bLow) / (bHigh - bLow);
00155                 x = wG * right + (1.0f - wG) * left;
00156         }
00157         return x;
00158 }

00160 //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00161 
00162 float OneStepBiweightAlgorithm(const vector<float> & x, float c, float epsilon)
00163 {
00164         if (x.size() == 0)
00165                 return 0.0f;
00166 
00167         float medianValue = median(x);  
00168         float MAD = medianAbsoluteDeviation(x) * c + epsilon;
00169         int n = (int) x.size();
00170         float value=0.0f;
00171         float weightedSumNumer=0.0f;
00172         float weightedSumDenom=0.0f;
00173 
00174         for (int i=0; i<n; i++)
00175         {
00176                 float diff = x[i] - medianValue;
00177                 float u = diff / MAD;
00178                 float uSquare = u * u;
00179                 float oneMinusUSqaure = 1.0f - uSquare;
00180                 if (fabs(u) < 1.0f)
00181                 {
00182                         weightedSumNumer += diff * oneMinusUSqaure * oneMinusUSqaure;
00183                         weightedSumDenom += oneMinusUSqaure * oneMinusUSqaure;
00184                 }
00185         }
00186         
00187         if (weightedSumDenom != 0.0f)
00188         {
00189                 value = medianValue + weightedSumNumer / weightedSumDenom;
00190         }
00191 
00192         return value;
00193 }
00194 
00195 //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00196 
00197 float UncertaintyOfEstimate(const vector<float> & x, float c, float epsilon)
00198 {
00199         if (x.size() == 0)
00200                 return 0.0f;
00201 
00202         float medianValue = median(x);
00203         float MAD = medianAbsoluteDeviation(x) * c + epsilon;
00204         int n = (int) x.size();
00205         float value=0.0f;
00206         float numer=0.0f;
00207         float denom=0.0f;
00208         
00209         for (int i=0; i<n; i++)
00210         {
00211                 float diff = x[i] - medianValue;
00212                 float u = diff / MAD;
00213                 float uSquare = u * u;
00214                 float oneMinusUSquare = 1.0f - uSquare;
00215                 if (fabs(u) < 1.0f)
00216                 {
00217                         numer += diff * diff * pow(oneMinusUSquare, 4);
00218                         denom += oneMinusUSquare * (1.0f - 5.0f * uSquare);
00219                 }
00220         }
00221         numer = sqrt(numer);
00222         denom = fabs(denom);
00223 
00224         if (denom != 0.0f)
00225                 value = numer / denom;
00226         
00227         return value;
00228 }

00230 //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00231 
00232 double ComputeEstIntenDiff(const vector<float> & v, float stp) 
00233 {
00234         double so = 0;
00235         if (v.size() == 0)
00236                 return so;
00237 
00238         if (v.size() == 1) {
00239                 so = v[0];
00240         }
00241         else {
00242                 double meanV = mean(v);
00243                 double s = 0;
00244                 int i;
00245                 for (i = 0; i < (int)v.size(); ++i) {
00246                         s += (v[i] - meanV) * (v[i] - meanV);
00247                 }
00248                 double std = sqrt(s / (v.size() - 1));  
00249                 double high = meanV + stp * std;
00250                 double low = meanV - stp * std;
00251                 s = 0;
00252                 int ctr = 0;
00253                 for (i = 0; i < (int)v.size(); ++i) {
00254                         if (v[i] <= high && v[i] >= low) {
00255                                 ctr ++;
00256                                 s += v[i];
00257                         }
00258                 }
00259                 so = s / (double) ctr;
00260         }
00261         return so;
00262 }

00264 //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00265 
00266 void formPTable(const int nT, vector<vector<float> > & vvP) {
00267         vector<int> mask(nT);
00268         int i;
00269         int j;
00270         int n;
00271         for (n = 0; n < nT; ++n) {
00272                 mask[n] = 1 << n;
00273         }
00274         for (n = 1; n <= nT; ++n) {
00275                 int twoToN = 1 << n;
00276                 vector <int> posRanks(twoToN);
00277                 for (i = 0; i < twoToN; ++i) {
00278                         int sum = 0;
00279                         for (j = 0; j < n; ++j) {
00280                                 if (i & mask[j])
00281                                         sum += j + 1;
00282                         }
00283                         posRanks[i] = sum;
00284                 }
00285                                 
00286                 for (i = 0; i < twoToN; ++i) {
00287                         vector<int> signedRanks(n);
00288                         int w = 0;
00289                         int myCode = 0;
00290                         int j;
00291                         for (j = 0; j < n; ++j) {
00292                                 if (i & mask[j]) {
00293                                         w += j + 1;
00294                                         myCode += 1 << j;
00295                                 }
00296                         }
00297                         double tail = 0;
00298                         for (j = 0; j < twoToN; ++j) {
00299                                 if (posRanks[j] > w) {
00300                                         tail ++;
00301                                 }
00302                                 else if (posRanks[j] == w) {
00303                                         tail += 0.5;
00304                                 }
00305                         }
00306                         vvP[n - 1][myCode] =  (float)(tail / (double) twoToN);
00307                 }
00308         }                               
00309 }
00310 /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00311 // Template Functions
00312 /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00313 template<class T> ExpResults oneSidedSignRank2(const vector<T> & x, const double alpha) 
00314 {
00315         // int len = (int) x.size(); // unused pk
00316         // 1. Ignore all zero differences.
00317         vector <T> newdiff = x;
00318         int n = 0;
00319         int i;
00320         for (i = 0; i < (int)x.size(); ++i) {
00321                 if (x[i] != 0.0) {
00322                         newdiff[n] = x[i];
00323                         n++;
00324                 }
00325         }
00326     if (n == 0) // No non-zero differences.  Output 0.5 as the one-sided p-value and detection is absent.
00327         return ExpResults (0.5, 0);
00328         newdiff.resize(n);
00329 
00330         // 2.  Assign integer ranks to the differences.
00331         vector <T> ranks(n);
00332         for (i=0; i<n; ++i) {
00333                 ranks[i] = (float)(i + 1);
00334         }
00335 
00336         // 3. Convert differences to absolute values and sort in ascending order.
00337         vector <struct ExpResults> absdiff(n);
00338         for (i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
00339                 absdiff[i].p_value = fabs(newdiff[i]);
00340                 absdiff[i].call = i;
00341         }
00342         sort(absdiff.begin(), absdiff.end());
00343 
00344         // 4. If there are ties among absolute differences, all differences in a tie
00345         //    group are assigned to a rank equal to the average of the integer ranks.
00346         int nTies = 0;  
00347     // Avoid cross-platform compatibility problems from approximate floating point arithmetic.
00348         const double tiny = 2e-09;
00349         for (i = 0; i < n - 1; ++i) {
00350                 if (fabs(absdiff[i].p_value - absdiff[i+1].p_value) < tiny)
00351                 {
00352                         nTies ++;
00353                         break;
00354                 }
00355         }
00356         int tieGroup = 0;
00357         double doubleVarMod = 0; // modification of variance due to ties.
00358         if (nTies) {
00359                 i = 0;
00360                 while ( i < n - 1) {
00361                         double initElement = absdiff[i].p_value;
00362                         int tieGroupSize = 1;
00363                         for (int j = i + 1; j < n; ++j) {
00364                                 if (fabs (absdiff[j].p_value - initElement) < tiny) {
00365                                         tieGroupSize ++;
00366                                         if (j == n - 1) {
00367                                                 i = j;
00368                                                 tieGroup ++;
00369                                                 for (int m = j - tieGroupSize + 1; m <= j; ++m) {
00370                                                         ranks[m] = (2*j - tieGroupSize + 3) / 2.0f;
00371                                                 }
00372                                                 doubleVarMod += tieGroupSize *
00373                                                         ((double)tieGroupSize * tieGroupSize - 1);
00374                                                 break;
00375                                         }
00376                                 }
00377                                 else {
00378                                         i = j;
00379                                         if (tieGroupSize > 1) {
00380                                                 tieGroup ++;
00381                                                 for (int m = j - tieGroupSize; m <= j - 1; ++m) {
00382                                                         ranks[m] = (2 * j - tieGroupSize + 1) / 2.0f;
00383                                                 }
00384                                                 doubleVarMod += tieGroupSize *
00385                                                         ((double)tieGroupSize * tieGroupSize - 1);
00386                                         }
00387                                         break;
00388                                 }
00389                         }
00390                 }
00391         }
00392         vector <T> invr(n);
00393         for (i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
00394                 invr[absdiff[i].call] = ranks[i];
00395         }
00396 
00397         double w = 0;
00398         for (i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
00399                 if (newdiff[i] > 0)
00400                         w += invr[i];
00401         }
00402         struct ExpResults ans;
00403         if (n > 11) {
00404                 // Use the asymptotic approximation:
00405                 // S' = [S - n(n+1)/4]/sqrt[n(n+1)(2n+1)/24 - c]
00406                 // where S is the sum of all positive signed ranks
00407                 // and c = sum(b(b*b - 1)/48 is the modification of variance due to ties.
00408                 //
00409                 // p-value = 1 - f(S')
00410                 // where f(S') is the cumulative distribution function of
00411                 // standard normal distribution.
00412                 double dw = w - ((double) n) * (n + 1) / 4.0;
00413                 double denom2 = (((double)n)*(n+1)*(2*n+1) - 0.5*doubleVarMod)/24.0;
00414                 if (denom2 <=0) {
00415                         return ExpResults(0, 0);
00416                 }
00417                 double z = dw / sqrt(denom2);
00418                 ans.p_value = 1 - normalCDF(z);
00419         }
00420         else {
00421                 if (nTies == 0)
00422                 {
00423                         int iCode = 0;
00424                         for (i=0; i < n; ++i)
00425                         {
00426                                 if (newdiff[i] > 0)
00427                                 {
00428                                         iCode += 1 << ((int) invr[i] - 1);
00429                                 }
00430                         }
00431                         ans.p_value = fGetPValue(n-1, iCode);
00432                 }
00433                 else
00434                 {
00435                         int twoToN = 1 << n;
00436                         vector<int> mask(n);
00437                         for (i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
00438                                 mask[i] = 1 << i;
00439                         }
00440                         vector <int> posRanks(twoToN);
00441                         for (i = 0; i < twoToN; ++i) {
00442                                 double sum = 0;
00443                                 for (int j = 0; j < n; ++j) {
00444                                         if (i & mask[j])
00445                                                 sum += ranks[j];
00446                                 }
00447                                 posRanks[i] = (int) sum;
00448                         }
00449                         double tail = 0;
00450                         for (i = 0; i < twoToN; ++i) {
00451                                 if (posRanks[i] > w) {
00452                                         tail ++;
00453                                 }
00454                                 else if (posRanks[i] == w) {
00455                                         tail += 0.5;
00456                                 }
00457                         }
00458                         ans.p_value = tail / (double) twoToN;
00459                 }
00460         }
00461         ans.call = (ans.p_value < alpha) ? 1 : 0;
00462         return ans;
00463 }
00464 
00465 //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00466 
00467 template<class T> ExpResults newSignRank(const vector<T> & dif, 
00468         const double alpha1, const double alpha2) {
00469         struct ExpResults newPH;
00470         struct ExpResults oldPH = oneSidedSignRank2(dif, alpha1);
00471         newPH.p_value = oldPH.p_value;
00472         if (oldPH.call == 1)
00473                 newPH.call = 2;   
00474         else if (oldPH.p_value < alpha2)
00475                 newPH.call = 1;
00476         else if (oldPH.p_value > 1 - alpha1)
00477                 newPH.call = -2;
00478         else if (oldPH.p_value > 1 - alpha2)
00479                 newPH.call = -1;
00480         else
00481                 newPH.call = 0;
00482         return newPH;
00483 }

00485 //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00486 
00487 template<class T> float mean(const vector<T> & v) {
00488         if (v.empty()) {
00489                 return -1;
00490         }
00491         double sum = 0;
00492         for (int i = 0; i < (int) v.size(); ++i) {
00493                 sum += v[i];
00494         }
00495         return (float)( sum / (double) v.size());
00496 }
00497 
00498 //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00499 
00500 template<class T> float median(const vector<T> & v) {
00501         vector <T> u = v;
00502         int len = (int) u.size();
00503         if (len < 1) {
00504                 return -1;
00505         }
00506         sort(u.begin(), u.end());
00507         int half = len / 2;
00508         if (len % 2 == 1) {
00509                 return (float)u[half];
00510         }
00511         else {
00512                 return ((float)u[half - 1] + (float)u[half]) / 2.0;
00513         }
00514 }
00515 
00516 //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00517 
00518 template<class T> float stddev(const vector<T> & v) {
00519         if (v.empty() || v.size() == 1) {
00520                 return -1.0;
00521         }
00522         float meanValue = mean(v);
00523         int n = (int) v.size();
00524         double sum = 0.0;
00525         for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i)
00526         {
00527                 sum += (v[i] - meanValue) * (v[i] - meanValue);
00528         }
00529         return sqrt((1.0 / (n - 1)) * sum);
00530 }
00531 
00532 //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00533 
00534 template<class T> float medianAbsoluteDeviation(const vector<T> & x)
00535 {
00536         float meanValue = median(x);
00537         int size = (int) x.size();
00538         vector<T> v(size);
00539         for (int i=0;i<size;i++)
00540         {
00541                 v[i] = fabs(x[i] - meanValue);
00542         }
00543         return median(v);
00544 }
00545 
00546 //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00547 
00548 template <class T> FloatPair trimMeanAndStd(vector<T> & v, const double p1, const double p2) {
00549         int total = (int) v.size();
00550         FloatPair fp(0, 0);
00551         if (total > 0) {
00552                 sort(v.begin(), v.end());
00553                 int n1 = 0;
00554                 int n2 = (int) floor(total * p2);
00555                 double subtotal = n2;
00556                 if (subtotal > 2) {
00557                         double sum = 0;
00558                         int i;
00559                         for (i = n1; i < n2; ++i) {
00560                                 sum += v[i];
00561                         }
00562                         double tMean = sum / subtotal;
00563                         sum = 0;
00564                         for (i = n1; i < n2; ++i) {
00565                                 sum += (v[i] - tMean) * (v[i] - tMean);
00566                         }
00567                         fp.value1 = (float) tMean;
00568                         fp.value2 = (float) sqrt(sum / (subtotal - 1));
00569                 }
00570                 else if (subtotal == 1) {
00571                         fp.value1 = v[n1];
00572                 }
00573         }
00574         return fp;
00575 }
00576 
00577 //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00578 
00579 template <class T> double trimMean(const vector<T> & vec, const double p1, const double p2) 
00580 {
00581         vector<T> whole = vec;
00582         int total = (int) whole.size();
00583         if (total == 0)
00584                 return 0.0f;
00585 
00586         sort(whole.begin(), whole.end());
00587 
00588         double dG1 = total * p1;
00589         double dG2 = total * (1.0 - p2);
00590         int g1 = (int) floor(dG1);
00591         int g2 = (int) floor(dG2);
00592         double r1 = dG1 - g1;
00593         double r2 = dG2 - g2;
00594         int last = total - g2 - 1;
00595         if (last <= 0.0f) { // it is theoretically impossible for last < 0, but
00596                 last = 0; // we add the code here to guarantee proper bounds even if there is any numerical unstability
00597         }
00598         double sum = (1.0f - r1) * whole[g1] + (1.0f - r2) * whole[last];
00599         for (int i = g1 + 1; i < last; ++i) {
00600                 sum += whole[i];
00601         }
00602         double subtotal = last - g1 -1;
00603         if (subtotal <= 0.0f) {
00604                 subtotal = 0.0;
00605         }
00606         subtotal += 2.0 - r1 - r2;
00607         return sum / subtotal;
00608 }

00629 //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00630 
00631 void CExpressionAlgorithmImplementation::Clear()
00632 {
00633         maskedProbes.clear();
00634         m_ProbeSetNames.clear();
00635         m_NumResults = 0;
00636         m_bCompDataExists = false;
00637     m_ControlInfo.clear();
00638         try
00639         {
00640                 m_Cell.Close();
00641                 m_Baseline.Close();
00642                 m_Cdf.Close();
00643         }
00644         catch (...)
00645         {
00646         }
00647 
00648         vector<AbsStatExpressionProbeSetResultType *>::iterator abs;
00649         for(abs = m_AbsStatResults.begin(); abs != m_AbsStatResults.end(); ++abs)
00650                 delete[] (*abs);
00651         m_AbsStatResults.erase(m_AbsStatResults.begin(), m_AbsStatResults.end());
00652         for(abs = m_BaselineAbsStatResults.begin(); abs != m_BaselineAbsStatResults.end(); ++abs)
00653                 delete[] (*abs);
00654         m_BaselineAbsStatResults.erase(m_BaselineAbsStatResults.begin(), m_BaselineAbsStatResults.end());
00655         vector<CompStatExpressionProbeSetResultType *>::iterator comp;
00656         for(comp = m_CompStatResults.begin(); comp != m_CompStatResults.end(); ++comp)
00657                 delete[] (*comp);
00658         m_CompStatResults.erase(m_CompStatResults.begin(), m_CompStatResults.end());
00659 
00660         if (m_ZonesInfo.pZones)
00661                 delete [] m_ZonesInfo.pZones;
00662         m_ZonesInfo.pZones = NULL;
00663 }

00749 //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00750 
00751 bool CExpressionAlgorithmImplementation::IsMasked(FusionCELData *cel, int x, int y)
00752 {
00753         if (cel->IsMasked(x, y) == true)
00754                 return true;
00755 
00756         if (maskedProbes.find(cel->XYToIndex(x, y)) != maskedProbes.end())
00757                 return true;
00758 
00759         return false;
00760 }
00761 
00762 //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00763 
00764 bool CExpressionAlgorithmImplementation::ReadNormMSKFile()
00765 {
00766         if (m_Params.NormMethod == CExpStatAlgSettings::NORM_TO_SELECTED_PROBE_SETS)
00767         {
00768                 // Read the MSK file.
00769                 m_Params.NormGenes.clear();
00770                 CMSKFileData msk;
00771                 msk.SetFileName(m_Params.NormMaskFile.c_str());
00772                 if (msk.Read() == false)
00773                 {
00774                         m_Error = "Unable to read the MSK file.";
00775                         Clear();
00776                         return false;
00777                 }
00778 
00779                 // Get the probe setes.
00780                 ProbeSetListConstIt begin;
00781                 ProbeSetListConstIt end;
00782                 ProbeSetListConstIt it;
00783                 msk.GetProbeSetIterators(begin, end);
00784                 for (it=begin; it!=end; ++it)
00785                 {
00786                         m_Params.NormGenes.push_back(*it);
00787                 }
00788         }
00789         return true;
00790 }
00791 
00792 //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00793 
00794 bool CExpressionAlgorithmImplementation::ReadScaleMSKFile()
00795 {
00796         if (m_Params.SFMethod == CExpStatAlgSettings::SCALE_TO_SELECTED_PROBE_SETS)
00797         {
00798                 // Read the MSK file.
00799                 m_Params.ScaleGenes.clear();
00800                 CMSKFileData msk;
00801                 msk.SetFileName(m_Params.ScaleMaskFile.c_str());
00802                 if (msk.Read() == false)
00803                 {
00804                         m_Error = "Unable to read the MSK file.";
00805                         Clear();
00806                         return false;
00807                 }
00808 
00809                 // Get the probe setes.
00810                 ProbeSetListConstIt begin;
00811                 ProbeSetListConstIt end;
00812                 ProbeSetListConstIt it;
00813                 msk.GetProbeSetIterators(begin, end);
00814                 for (it=begin; it!=end; ++it)
00815                 {
00816                         m_Params.ScaleGenes.push_back(*it);
00817                 }
00818         }
00819         return true;
00820 }
00821 
00822 //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00823 
00824 bool CExpressionAlgorithmImplementation::ReadProbeMSKFile()
00825 {
00826         // Check if a MSK file was given.
00827         maskedProbes.clear();
00828         if (m_Params.ProbeMaskFile.length() == 0)
00829                 return true;
00830 
00831         // Read the mask file.
00832         CMSKFileData msk;
00833         msk.SetFileName(m_Params.ProbeMaskFile.c_str());
00834         if (msk.Read() == false)
00835         {
00836                 m_Error = "Unable to read the MSK file.";
00837                 Clear();
00838                 return false;
00839         }
00840 
00841         // Get each item from the probe pair mask section.
00842         FusionCDFProbeSetInformation unit;
00843         FusionCDFProbeGroupInformation blk;
00844         FusionCDFProbeInformation cel;
00845         int index;
00846         int xyindex;
00847         ProbeSetIndiciesListConstIt begin;
00848         ProbeSetIndiciesListConstIt end;
00849         ProbeSetIndiciesListConstIt it;
00850         msk.GetProbeSetIndiciesIterators(begin, end);
00851         for (it=begin; it!=end; ++it)
00852         {
00853                 // Find the corresponding probe set and mask the pair (both PM and MM probe)
00854                 index = m_ProbeSetNames[it->probeSetName];
00855                 m_Cdf.GetProbeSetInformation(index, unit);
00856                 unit.GetGroupInformation(0, blk);
00857                 for (list<int>::const_iterator pairIt=it->indicies.begin(); pairIt!=it->indicies.end(); ++pairIt)
00858                 {
00859                         index = 2*(*pairIt);
00860                         if (index+1 >= blk.GetNumCells())
00861                                 continue;
00862 
00863                         // Mask the PM probe
00864                         blk.GetCell(index, cel);
00865                         xyindex = m_Cell.XYToIndex(cel.GetX(), cel.GetY());
00866                         maskedProbes.insert(make_pair(xyindex, true));
00867 
00868                         // Mask the MM probe.
00869                         blk.GetCell(index+1, cel);
00870                         xyindex = m_Cell.XYToIndex(cel.GetX(), cel.GetY());
00871                         maskedProbes.insert(make_pair(xyindex, true));
00872                 }
00873         }
00874         return true;
00875 }
00876 
00877 //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00878 
00879 bool CExpressionAlgorithmImplementation::ReadCelFile(const char *celFile)
00880 {
00881         // Read the CEL file
00882         m_Cell.SetFileName(celFile);
00883         if (m_Cell.Exists() == false)
00884         {
00885                 m_Error = "The input CEL file does not exist.";
00886                 Clear();
00887                 return false;
00888         }
00889         if (m_Cell.Read() == false)
00890         {
00891                 m_Error = "Unable to read the input CEL file.";
00892                 Clear();
00893                 return false;
00894         }
00895 
00896     // Modify the saturated intensity if the CEL file was created from the HP scanner.
00897     if (FromHP(m_Cell) == true)
00898         m_Params.SaturatedIntensity = m_Params.HPSaturatedIntensity;
00899 
00900         return true;
00901 }
00902 
00903 //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00904 
00905 bool CExpressionAlgorithmImplementation::ReadBaselineCelFile(const char *baseline)
00906 {
00907         // Read the baseline CEL file
00908         if (baseline != 0 && baseline[0] != 0)
00909         {
00910                 m_bCompDataExists = true;
00911                 m_Baseline.SetFileName(baseline);
00912                 if (m_Baseline.Exists() == false)
00913                 {
00914                         m_Error = "The baseline CEL file does not exist.";
00915                         Clear();
00916                         return false;
00917                 }
00918                 if (m_Baseline.Read() == false)
00919                 {
00920                         m_Error = "Unable to read the baseline CEL file.";
00921                         Clear();
00922                         return false;
00923                 }
00924         }
00925         return true;
00926 }
00927 
00928 //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00929 
00930 bool CExpressionAlgorithmImplementation::ReadCdfFile(const char *cdfFile)
00931 {
00932         // Read the CDF file.
00933         m_Cdf.SetFileName(cdfFile);
00934         if (m_Cdf.Exists() == false)
00935         {
00936                 m_Error = "The associated library file (CDF) does not exist.";
00937                 Clear();
00938                 return false;
00939         }
00940         if (m_Cdf.Read() == false)
00941         {
00942                 m_Error = "Unable to read the library file.";
00943                 Clear();
00944                 return false;
00945         }
00946 
00947         // Check CDF file for all expression units.
00948         int iunit;
00949         m_NumResults = m_Cdf.GetHeader().GetNumProbeSets();
00950         for (iunit=0; iunit<m_NumResults; iunit++)
00951         {
00952                 if (m_Cdf.GetProbeSetType(iunit) != affxcdf::ExpressionProbeSetType)
00953                 {
00954                         m_Error = "Unable to run algorithm on non-Expression arrays.";
00955                         Clear();
00956                         return false;
00957                 }
00958         }
00959         m_NumFeatures = m_Cdf.GetHeader().GetCols() * m_Cdf.GetHeader().GetRows();
00960         return true;
00961 }
00962 
00963 //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00964 
00965 bool CExpressionAlgorithmImplementation::ReadCdfFile(FusionCELData& cel)
00966 {
00967         // Read the CDF file.
00968         string cdfFile = Fs::join(m_LibPath, StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(cel.GetChipType()) + ".CDF");
00969         m_Cdf.SetFileName(cdfFile.c_str());
00970         if (m_Cdf.Exists() == false)
00971         {
00972                 m_Error = "The associated library file (CDF) does not exist.";
00973                 Clear();
00974                 return false;
00975         }
00976         if (m_Cdf.Read() == false)
00977         {
00978                 m_Error = "Unable to read the library file.";
00979                 Clear();
00980                 return false;
00981         }
00982 
00983         // Check CDF file for all expression units.
00984         int iunit;
00985         m_NumResults = m_Cdf.GetHeader().GetNumProbeSets();
00986         for (iunit=0; iunit<m_NumResults; iunit++)
00987         {
00988                 if (m_Cdf.GetProbeSetType(iunit) != affxcdf::ExpressionProbeSetType)
00989                 {
00990                         m_Error = "Unable to run algorithm on non-Expression arrays.";
00991                         Clear();
00992                         return false;
00993                 }
00994         }
00995         m_NumFeatures = m_Cdf.GetHeader().GetCols() * m_Cdf.GetHeader().GetRows();
00996         return true;
00997 }
00998 
00999 //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
01000 
01001 void CExpressionAlgorithmImplementation::AllocateMemoryForResults()
01002 {
01003         // Allocate memory for the results
01004         m_AbsStatResults.resize(m_NumResults, NULL);
01005         if (m_bCompDataExists == true)
01006                 m_CompStatResults.resize(m_NumResults, NULL);
01007 
01008 
01009         // Copy the probe set names and allocate memory.
01010         string name;
01011         for (int iunit=0; iunit<m_NumResults; iunit++)
01012         {
01013                 name = m_Cdf.GetProbeSetName(iunit);
01014                 m_ProbeSetNames[name] = iunit;
01015                 m_AbsStatResults[iunit] = new AbsStatExpressionProbeSetResultType;
01016                 if (m_bCompDataExists == true)
01017                         m_CompStatResults[iunit] = new CompStatExpressionProbeSetResultType;
01018         }
01019 }
01020 
01021 //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
01022 
01023 bool CExpressionAlgorithmImplementation::CheckIntensityData()
01024 {
01025         // Check if there is any data left.
01026         if (AllMaskedOut(&m_Cell))
01027         {
01028                 m_Error = "Unable to compute expression results. The data has all been masked.";
01029                 Clear();
01030                 return false;
01031         }
01032         if (IsBlankCellFile(&m_Cell))
01033         {
01034                 m_Error = "Unable to compute expression results. The data is all zeros.";
01035                 Clear();
01036                 return false;
01037         }
01038 
01039         // Now check the baseline data.
01040         if (m_bCompDataExists == true)
01041         {
01042                 if (AllMaskedOut(&m_Baseline))
01043                 {
01044                         m_Error = "Unable to compute expression results. The baseline data has all been masked.";
01045                         Clear();
01046                         return false;
01047                 }
01048                 if (IsBlankCellFile(&m_Baseline))
01049                 {
01050                         m_Error = "Unable to compute expression results. The baseline data is all zeros.";
01051                         Clear();
01052                         return false;
01053                 }
01054         }
01055         return true;
01056 }
01057 
01058 //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
01059 
01060 bool CExpressionAlgorithmImplementation::RunStat(const char *celFile, const char *baseline, const char *cdfFile)
01061 {
01062         // Clear old results.
01063         Clear();
01064         m_Error.erase();
01065 
01066         // Read the CEL file
01067         if (ReadCelFile(celFile) == false)
01068                 return false;
01069 
01070         // Read the baseline CEL file
01071         if (ReadBaselineCelFile(baseline) == false)
01072                 return false;
01073 
01074         // Read the CDF file.
01075         if (ReadCdfFile(cdfFile) == false)
01076                 return false;
01077 
01078         // Allocate memory for the results
01079         AllocateMemoryForResults();
01080 
01081         // Read the MSK file
01082         if (ReadProbeMSKFile() == false)
01083                 return false;
01084 
01085         // Check the intensity data
01086         if (CheckIntensityData() == false)
01087                 return false;
01088 
01089         // Read the MSK files for normalization and scaling probe sets.
01090         if (ReadNormMSKFile() == false || ReadScaleMSKFile() == false)
01091                 return false;
01092 
01093         // Call the algorithms
01094         ComputeStat();
01095 
01096         return true;
01097 }
01098 
01099 //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
01100 
01101 void CExpressionAlgorithmImplementation::ComputeStat()
01102 {
01103         // Make the expression call.    
01104         for (int iunit=0; iunit<m_NumResults; iunit++)
01105                 ComputeExpressionStat(&m_Cell, iunit,  m_AbsStatResults[iunit]);
01106 
01107         // Compute the scaled and adjusted intensities for perfect match and mis match cells
01108         // based on new expression algorithm by Earl Hubbell, Mark Durst.
01109         vector<vector<bool> > UseAtomE(m_NumResults);
01110         vector<vector<float> > PMe(m_NumResults);               // Scaled & Adjusted Intensity, SA
01111         vector<vector<float> > MMe(m_NumResults);               // Scaled & Adjusted Intensity, SA
01112         vector<vector<FloatPair> > BGe(m_NumResults);           // Smoothing Background. (PM in value1, MM in value2)
01113         vector<vector<FloatPair> > NoiseE(m_NumResults);        // Noise. (PM in value1, MM in value2)
01114         vector<float> featureIntene;            // Scaled & Adjusted Intensity by feature
01115 
01116         // Pass in member zone info variable for experiment
01117         ComputeScaledAdjustedIntensity(&m_Cell, PMe, MMe, UseAtomE, BGe, NoiseE, m_ZonesInfo, featureIntene);
01118 
01119         // Compute the measurement and confidence.
01120         vector<float> avgMeasurementE(m_NumResults);    // Average measurement.
01121         vector<vector<float> > PVe(m_NumResults);
01122         ComputeMeasurement(PMe, MMe, UseAtomE, avgMeasurementE, PVe);
01123 
01124         // Set the measurement to the chip file.
01125         SetMeasurement(BGe, avgMeasurementE, m_AbsStatResults);
01126 
01127         // Determine the scale factor based on the average measurement.
01128         m_Params.ScaleFactor = DetermineScaleFactor(m_AbsStatResults);
01129         if (m_Params.ScaleFactor != 1.0f)
01130                 ModifyIntensities(m_AbsStatResults, m_Params.ScaleFactor);
01131 
01132 
01133         // Compute the absolute statistics for the baseline CEL file.
01134         if (m_bCompDataExists == true)
01135         {
01136                 // Make the expression call.    
01137                 //vector<AbsStatExpressionProbeSetResultType *> baselineAbsStatResults;
01138                 m_BaselineAbsStatResults.resize(m_NumResults, NULL);
01139                 for (int iunit=0; iunit<m_NumResults; iunit++)
01140                 {
01141                         m_BaselineAbsStatResults[iunit] = new AbsStatExpressionProbeSetResultType;
01142                         ComputeExpressionStat(&m_Baseline, iunit,  m_BaselineAbsStatResults[iunit]);
01143                 }
01144 
01145                 // Compute the scaled and adjusted intensities for perfect match and mis match cells
01146                 // based on new expression algorithm by Earl Hubbell, Mark Durst.
01147                 vector<vector<bool> > UseAtomB(m_NumResults);
01148                 vector<vector<float> > PMb(m_NumResults);               // Scaled & Adjusted Intensity, SA
01149                 vector<vector<float> > MMb(m_NumResults);               // Scaled & Adjusted Intensity, SA
01150                 vector<vector<FloatPair> > BGb(m_NumResults);           // Smoothing Background. (PM in value1, MM in value2)
01151                 vector<vector<FloatPair> > NoiseB(m_NumResults);        // Noise. (PM in value1, MM in value2)
01152                 vector<float> featureIntenb;            // Scaled & Adjusted Intensity by feature
01153                 
01154                 // Pass in local zone info variable for baseline
01155                 AllZonesInfoType zonesinfo;
01156                 ComputeScaledAdjustedIntensity(&m_Baseline, PMb, MMb, UseAtomB, BGb, NoiseB, zonesinfo, featureIntenb);
01157                 if (zonesinfo.pZones) delete[] zonesinfo.pZones;
01158 
01159                 // Compute the measurement and confidence.
01160                 vector<float> avgMeasurementB(m_NumResults);    // Average measurement.
01161                 vector<vector<float> > PVb(m_NumResults);
01162                 ComputeMeasurement(PMb, MMb, UseAtomB, avgMeasurementB, PVb);
01163 
01164                 // Set the measurement to the chip file.
01165                 SetMeasurement(BGb, avgMeasurementB, m_BaselineAbsStatResults);
01166 
01167                 // Determine the scale factor based on the average measurement.
01168                 m_Params.BaseScaleFactor = DetermineScaleFactor(m_BaselineAbsStatResults);
01169                 if (m_Params.BaseScaleFactor != 1.0f)
01170                         ModifyIntensities(m_BaselineAbsStatResults, m_Params.BaseScaleFactor);
01171 
01172                 // Compute the comparison call.
01173                 CallComparison(m_Params.ScaleFactor, m_Params.BaseScaleFactor, m_BaselineAbsStatResults, BGe, BGb);
01174 
01175 
01176                 // Determine the normalization factor
01177                 DetermineNormFactor(m_AbsStatResults, m_BaselineAbsStatResults);
01178 
01179                 // Normalize the intensities and signal values.
01180                 if (m_Params.NormFactor != 1.0f)
01181                         ModifyIntensities(m_AbsStatResults, m_Params.NormFactor);
01182 
01183                 // Scale and Normalize the PV before computing fold change.
01184                 for (int i=0; i<m_NumResults; i++)
01185                 {
01186                         int nProbePair = (int) PVe[i].size();
01187                         for (int j=0; j<nProbePair; j++)
01188                         {
01189                                 PVe[i][j] += (float)logtwo(m_Params.ScaleFactor) + (float)logtwo(m_Params.NormFactor);  // PV is log scale.
01190                                 PVb[i][j] += (float)logtwo(m_Params.BaseScaleFactor) + (float)logtwo(1.0);
01191                         }
01192                 }
01193 
01194 
01195                 // Compute the fold change.
01196                 ComputeFoldChange(PVb, PVe, UseAtomB, UseAtomE);
01197         }
01198 
01199         // Compute some summary statistics
01200         ComputeAvgMaxMinStdBgNoise(BGe, NoiseE);
01201 
01202         CRawQ rawQ;
01203         rawQ.SetDefaults();
01204         rawQ.SetVerticalZones(m_Params.NumberVertZones);
01205         rawQ.SetHorizontalZones(m_Params.NumberHorZones);
01206         rawQ.SetPercentBG(m_Params.NumberBGCells);
01207         m_RawQ = rawQ.ComputeRawQ(m_Cell, m_Cdf);
01208         if (m_bCompDataExists == true)
01209                 m_BaselineRawQ = rawQ.ComputeRawQ(m_Baseline, m_Cdf);
01210 
01211         ReportCornerControls(affxcdf::CheckerboardPositiveQCProbeSetType);
01212         ReportCornerControls(affxcdf::CheckerboardNegativeQCProbeSetType);
01213         ReportCornerControls(affxcdf::CentralCrossPositiveQCProbeSetType);
01214         ReportCornerControls(affxcdf::CentralCrossNegativeQCProbeSetType);
01215 
01216         // Optionally generate a cel file containing background corrected
01217         // experiment intensities
01218         if (m_WriteCell)
01219         {
01220                 affxcel::CCELFileWriter writeCell;
01221                 writeCell.SetFileName (m_Cell.GetFileName().c_str());
01222                 if (! writeCell.Read())
01223                 {
01224                         cerr << "Unable to read cel file." << endl;
01225                         return;
01226                 }
01227                 // ensure not mapped read-only
01228                 writeCell.EnsureNotMmapped();
01229                 for (int celIx = 0; celIx < m_NumFeatures; ++celIx)
01230                         writeCell.SetIntensity (celIx, featureIntene[celIx]);
01231                 if (strlen (m_OutputDirectory) == 0)
01232                 {
01233                         cerr << "An output directory is required to write a cel file." << endl;
01234                         return;
01235                 }
01236                 string outCell = Fs::join(m_OutputDirectory,Fs::basename(m_Cell.GetFileName()));
01237                 writeCell.SetFileName (outCell.c_str());
01238                 if (! writeCell.WriteTextCel())
01239                 {
01240                         cerr << "Error writing cel file." << endl;
01241                         cerr << writeCell.GetError() << endl;
01242                 }
01243         }
01244 }
01245 
01246 //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
01247 
01248 bool CExpressionAlgorithmImplementation::DetermineRelCallNormFactor(float sfe, float sfb)
01249 {
01250         FusionCDFProbeSetInformation unit;
01251         FusionCDFProbeGroupInformation blk;
01252         FusionCDFProbeInformation pmCell;
01253         FusionCDFProbeInformation mmCell;
01254 
01255         m_RelNF = 1.0f;
01256         m_RelNF2 = 1.0f;
01257 
01258         float absNFDiff = (float) fabs(m_Params.NormFactor - 1.0f);
01259         if ( (m_Params.NormMethod == CExpStatAlgSettings::DEFINED_NORMALIZATION_FACTOR) && (absNFDiff > 0.001f) )
01260         {
01261                 float baselineSF = sfb;
01262                 float expSF = sfe;
01263                 m_RelNF = m_Params.NormFactor * expSF / baselineSF;
01264                 m_RelNF2 = m_RelNF;
01265                 return true;
01266         }
01267 
01268         int numAtomsUsed;
01269         int     numBaseAtomsUsed;
01270         int numUnitUsed = 0;
01271         int numBaseUnitUsed = 0;
01272 
01273         // float factorE = sfe; // unused pk
01274         // float factorB = sfb; // unused pk
01275 
01276         // Loop over all of the units.
01277         int UnitsPerChip = m_Cdf.GetHeader().GetNumProbeSets();
01278         vector<vector<float> > diffE(UnitsPerChip);
01279         vector<vector<float> > diffB(UnitsPerChip);
01280         vector<float> estIntenDiffE(UnitsPerChip, 0.0f);
01281         vector<float> estIntenDiffB(UnitsPerChip, 0.0f);
01282         vector<float> estIntenPosDiffE(UnitsPerChip, 0.0f);
01283         vector<float> estIntenPosDiffB(UnitsPerChip, 0.0f);
01284         vector<vector<float> > PMe(UnitsPerChip);
01285         vector<vector<float> > PMb(UnitsPerChip);
01286         vector<float> estPMIntenE(UnitsPerChip, 0.0f);
01287         vector<float> estPMIntenB(UnitsPerChip, 0.0f);
01288 
01289         float stp = m_Params.STP;
01290 
01291         std::string probeSetName;
01292         for (int iUnit=0; iUnit<UnitsPerChip; iUnit++)
01293         {
01294                 probeSetName = m_Cdf.GetProbeSetName(iUnit);
01295                 if (m_Params.NormMethod == CExpStatAlgSettings::NORM_TO_SELECTED_PROBE_SETS &&
01296                         this->UseUnitInNormFactor(probeSetName, m_Params.NormGenes) == false)
01297                         continue;
01298 
01299                 m_Cdf.GetProbeSetInformation(iUnit, unit);
01300                 unit.GetGroupInformation(0, blk);
01301                 int numCells = blk.GetNumCells();
01302                 int nAtoms = blk.GetNumLists();
01303                 diffE[iUnit].resize(nAtoms);
01304                 diffB[iUnit].resize(nAtoms);
01305                 PMe[iUnit].resize(nAtoms);
01306                 PMb[iUnit].resize(nAtoms);
01307                 numAtomsUsed = 0;
01308                 numBaseAtomsUsed = 0;
01309 
01310                 for (int iCell=0; iCell<numCells; iCell+=2)
01311                 {
01312                         blk.GetCell(iCell, pmCell);
01313                         blk.GetCell(iCell+1, mmCell);
01314 
01315                         // Check if atom is used in the exp chip.
01316                         if (IsMasked(&m_Cell, pmCell.GetX(), pmCell.GetY()) == false &&
01317                                 IsMasked(&m_Cell, mmCell.GetX(), mmCell.GetY()) == false)
01318                         {
01319                                 diffE[iUnit][numAtomsUsed] = (
01320                                         m_Cell.GetIntensity(pmCell.GetX(), pmCell.GetY()) -
01321                                         m_Cell.GetIntensity(mmCell.GetX(), mmCell.GetY()));
01322                                 PMe[iUnit][numAtomsUsed] = m_Cell.GetIntensity(pmCell.GetX(), pmCell.GetY());
01323                                 numAtomsUsed++;
01324                         }
01325 
01326                         // Check if atom is used in the baseline chip.
01327                         if (IsMasked(&m_Baseline, pmCell.GetX(), pmCell.GetY()) == false &&
01328                                 IsMasked(&m_Baseline, mmCell.GetX(), mmCell.GetY()) == false)
01329                         {
01330                                 diffB[iUnit][numBaseAtomsUsed] = (
01331                                         m_Baseline.GetIntensity(pmCell.GetX(), pmCell.GetY()) -
01332                                         m_Baseline.GetIntensity(mmCell.GetX(), mmCell.GetY()));
01333                                 PMb[iUnit][numBaseAtomsUsed] = m_Baseline.GetIntensity(pmCell.GetX(), pmCell.GetY());
01334                                 numBaseAtomsUsed++;
01335                         }
01336                 }
01337 
01338                 diffE[iUnit].resize(numAtomsUsed);
01339                 diffB[iUnit].resize(numBaseAtomsUsed);
01340                 PMe[iUnit].resize(numAtomsUsed);
01341                 PMb[iUnit].resize(numBaseAtomsUsed);
01342                 if (numAtomsUsed > 0)
01343                 {
01344                         estIntenDiffE[numUnitUsed] = (float)ComputeEstIntenDiff(diffE[iUnit], stp);
01345                         estIntenPosDiffE[numUnitUsed] = (estIntenDiffE[numUnitUsed] > 0.0f) ? estIntenDiffE[numUnitUsed] : 0.0f;
01346                         estPMIntenE[numUnitUsed] = (float)ComputeEstIntenDiff(PMe[iUnit], stp);
01347                         numUnitUsed++;
01348                 }
01349 
01350                 if (numBaseAtomsUsed > 0)
01351                 {
01352                         estIntenDiffB[numBaseUnitUsed] = (float)ComputeEstIntenDiff(diffB[iUnit], stp);
01353                         estIntenPosDiffB[numBaseUnitUsed] = (estIntenDiffB[numBaseUnitUsed] > 0.0f) ? estIntenDiffB[numBaseUnitUsed] : 0.0f;
01354                         estPMIntenB[numBaseUnitUsed] = (float)ComputeEstIntenDiff(PMb[iUnit], stp);
01355                         numBaseUnitUsed++;
01356                 }
01357         }
01358 
01359         estIntenDiffE.resize(numUnitUsed);
01360         estIntenPosDiffE.resize(numUnitUsed);
01361         estIntenDiffB.resize(numBaseUnitUsed);
01362         estIntenPosDiffB.resize(numBaseUnitUsed);
01363         estPMIntenE.resize(numUnitUsed);
01364         estPMIntenB.resize(numBaseUnitUsed);
01365 
01366         float p1 = m_Params.IntensityLowPercent / 100;
01367         float p2 = 1.0f - m_Params.IntensityHighPercent / 100;
01368         
01369         // Calculate the primary normalization factor for PM-MM
01370         float TMe = (float)trimMean(estIntenDiffE, p1, p2);
01371         if (TMe <= 0.0f) 
01372         {
01373                 TMe = (float)trimMean(estIntenPosDiffE, p1, p2);
01374                 if (TMe <= 0.0f)
01375                         return false;
01376         }
01377 
01378         float TMb = (float)trimMean(estIntenDiffB, p1, p2);
01379         if (TMb <= 0.0f)
01380         {
01381                 TMb = (float)trimMean(estIntenPosDiffB, p1, p2);
01382                 if (TMb <= 0.0f)
01383                         return false;
01384         }
01385 
01386         this->m_RelNF = TMb / TMe;
01387 
01388         // Calculate the primary normalization factor for PM-B
01389         TMe = (float)trimMean(estPMIntenE, p1, p2);
01390         TMb = (float)trimMean(estPMIntenB, p1, p2);
01391 
01392         if (TMe > 0.0f)
01393                 this->m_RelNF2 = TMb / TMe;
01394         else
01395                 return false;
01396 
01397         return true;
01398 }
01399 
01400 //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
01401 
01402 void CExpressionAlgorithmImplementation::CallComparison
01403 (
01404         float sfe,
01405         float sfb,
01406         vector<AbsStatExpressionProbeSetResultType *> &baselineAbsStatResults,
01407         vector<vector<FloatPair> > & BGe,
01408         vector<vector<FloatPair> > & BGb
01409 )
01410 {
01411         int numAtomsUsed;
01412         int numCommonAtoms;
01413         FusionCDFProbeSetInformation unit;
01414         FusionCDFProbeGroupInformation blk;
01415         FusionCDFProbeInformation pmCell;
01416         FusionCDFProbeInformation mmCell;
01417 
01418         bool bRelCallNormFactor = DetermineRelCallNormFactor(sfe, sfb);
01419 
01420         // float factorE = sfe; // unused pk
01421         // float factorB = sfb; // unused pk
01422 
01423         // Loop over all of the units.
01424         int UnitsPerChip = m_Cdf.GetHeader().GetNumProbeSets();
01425         for (int iUnit=0; iUnit<UnitsPerChip; iUnit++)
01426         {
01427                 CompStatExpressionProbeSetResultType *pUnitCompResult = GetCompStatResult(iUnit);
01428                 
01429                 AbsStatExpressionProbeSetResultType *pUnitAbsResult = GetAbsStatResult(iUnit);
01430 
01431                 // AbsStatExpressionProbeSetResultType *pBaseUnitResult = baselineAbsStatResults[iUnit]; // unused pk
01432 
01433                 // Initialize the number of atoms used.
01434                 numAtomsUsed = 0;
01435                 numCommonAtoms = 0;
01436 
01437                 // Loop over all atoms to determine the number of probe pairs
01438                 // for which the difference and ratio are significantly greater
01439                 // than the baseline.
01440                 int nAtoms = pUnitAbsResult->NumPairs;
01441                 vector<float> pmB(nAtoms, 0.0);
01442                 vector<float> pmE(nAtoms, 0.0);
01443                 vector<float> mmB(nAtoms, 0.0);
01444                 vector<float> mmE(nAtoms, 0.0);
01445                 vector<float> PMinusBgB(nAtoms, 0.0);
01446                 vector<float> PMinusBgE(nAtoms, 0.0);
01447                 vector<float> diffB(nAtoms, 0.0);
01448                 vector<float> diffE(nAtoms, 0.0);
01449 
01450 
01451                 m_Cdf.GetProbeSetInformation(iUnit, unit);
01452                 unit.GetGroupInformation(0, blk);
01453                 int numCells = blk.GetNumCells();
01454                 int ctr = 0;
01455                 for (int iCell=0; iCell<numCells; iCell+=2)
01456                 {
01457                         blk.GetCell(iCell, pmCell);
01458                         blk.GetCell(iCell+1, mmCell);
01459 
01460                         if (IsMasked(&m_Cell, pmCell.GetX(), pmCell.GetY()) == false &&
01461                                 IsMasked(&m_Cell, mmCell.GetX(), mmCell.GetY()) == false &&
01462                                 IsMasked(&m_Baseline, pmCell.GetX(), pmCell.GetY()) == false &&
01463                                 IsMasked(&m_Baseline, mmCell.GetX(), mmCell.GetY()) == false)
01464                         {
01465                                 ++numAtomsUsed;
01466 
01467                                 float expMatchCellI = m_Cell.GetIntensity(pmCell.GetX(), pmCell.GetY());
01468                                 float expMismatchCellI = m_Cell.GetIntensity(mmCell.GetX(), mmCell.GetY());
01469                                 float baselineMatchCellI = m_Baseline.GetIntensity(pmCell.GetX(), pmCell.GetY());
01470                                 float baselineMismatchCellI = m_Baseline.GetIntensity(mmCell.GetX(), mmCell.GetY());
01471 
01472                                 // Scale back the cell intensities for comparison.
01473                                 if (expMatchCellI < m_Params.SaturatedIntensity &&
01474                                         expMismatchCellI < m_Params.SaturatedIntensity &&
01475                                         baselineMatchCellI < m_Params.SaturatedIntensity &&
01476                                         baselineMismatchCellI < m_Params.SaturatedIntensity)
01477                                 {
01478                                         pmB[ctr] = baselineMatchCellI;
01479                                         float mm = baselineMismatchCellI;
01480                                         // No need to scale down the background like what we did in MAS since
01481                                         // the background is calculated on fly.
01482                                         float backGround = BGb[iUnit][iCell/2].value1;
01483                                         PMinusBgB[ctr] = pmB[ctr] - backGround;
01484                                         diffB[ctr] = pmB[ctr] - mm;
01485 
01486                                         pmE[ctr] = expMatchCellI;
01487                                         mm = expMismatchCellI;
01488                                         backGround = BGe[iUnit][iCell/2].value1;
01489                                         PMinusBgE[ctr] = pmE[ctr] - backGround;
01490                                         diffE[ctr] = pmE[ctr] - mm;
01491                                         ctr ++;
01492                                 }
01493                         }
01494                 }
01495 
01496                 pUnitCompResult->NumCommonPairs = 0;
01497 
01498                 if (ctr<=0 || bRelCallNormFactor == false)
01499                 {
01500                         // All intensities are greater than the saturated intensity value.
01501                         // No Call will be returned.
01502                         pUnitCompResult->Change = EXP_NO_COMP_CALL_TYPE;
01503                         pUnitCompResult->ChangePValue = 0;
01504                 }
01505                 else
01506                 {
01507                         pmB.resize(ctr);
01508                         mmB.resize(ctr);
01509                         PMinusBgB.resize(ctr);
01510                         diffB.resize(ctr);
01511                         pmE.resize(ctr);
01512                         mmE.resize(ctr);
01513                         PMinusBgE.resize(ctr);
01514                         diffE.resize(ctr);
01515 
01516                         float gamma1 = m_Params.Gamma1H;
01517                         float gamma2 = m_Params.Gamma2H;
01518 
01519                         ComputeIntensityDependentSignificances(gamma1, gamma2, pmE, pmB);
01520 
01521                         DetermineComparativeCall(pUnitCompResult, diffE, diffB, PMinusBgE, PMinusBgB, m_Params.Gamma1H, m_Params.Gamma2H);
01522 
01523                         pUnitCompResult->NumCommonPairs = ctr;
01524                 }
01525         }
01526 }
01527 
01528 //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
01529 
01530 void CExpressionAlgorithmImplementation::DetermineComparativeCall
01531 (
01532         CompStatExpressionProbeSetResultType *pCompData, 
01533         vector<float> &diffE,
01534         vector<float> &diffB,
01535         vector<float> &PMinusBgE,
01536         vector<float> &PMinusBgB,
01537         float gamma1, float gamma2
01538 )
01539 {
01540         float oneMinusGamma1 = 1.0f - gamma1;
01541         float oneMinusGamma2 = 1.0f - gamma2;
01542 
01543         vector<float> multipliers(3);
01544         multipliers[0] = 1.0f / m_Params.Perturbation;
01545         multipliers[1] = 1.0f;
01546         multipliers[2] = m_Params.Perturbation;
01547 
01548         vector<float> pValues(3, 0.0f);
01549         int size = (int) diffE.size();
01550         for (int i=0; i<3; i++) 
01551         {
01552                 float nf  = multipliers[i] * m_RelNF;
01553                 float nf2 = multipliers[i] * m_RelNF2;
01554                 int size2 = 2 * size;
01555                 vector<float> nDiff(size2, 0.0f);
01556                 for (int j=0; j < size; j++)
01557                 {
01558                         nDiff[j] = nf * diffE[j] - diffB[j];
01559                 }
01560                 for (int j=size; j < size2; j++)
01561                 {
01562                         nDiff[j] = m_Params.CMultiplier * 
01563                                 (nf2 * PMinusBgE[j - size] - PMinusBgB[j - size]);
01564                 }       
01565 
01566                 ExpResults result = newSignRank(nDiff, gamma1, gamma2);
01567                 pValues[i] = (float)result.p_value;
01568         }
01569                                 
01570 
01571         int Decision = EXP_NO_CHANGE_CALL_TYPE;
01572 
01573         if (pValues[0] < gamma1 && pValues[1] < gamma1 && pValues[2] < gamma1) 
01574         {
01575                 Decision = EXP_INCREASE_CALL_TYPE;
01576         }
01577         else if (pValues[0] > oneMinusGamma1 && pValues[1] > oneMinusGamma1 && pValues[2] > oneMinusGamma1) 
01578         {
01579                 Decision = EXP_DECREASE_CALL_TYPE;
01580         }
01581         else if (pValues[0] < gamma2 && pValues[1] < gamma2 && pValues[2] < gamma2) 
01582         {
01583                 Decision = EXP_INCREASE_MODERATE_CALL_TYPE;
01584         }
01585         else if (pValues[0] > oneMinusGamma2 && pValues[1] > oneMinusGamma2 && pValues[2] > oneMinusGamma2) 
01586         {
01587                 Decision = EXP_DECREASE_MODERATE_CALL_TYPE;
01588         }
01589 
01590         pCompData->Change = Decision;
01591         float fCriticalPValue = 0.5f;
01592         if ( pValues[0] < 0.5f && pValues[1] < 0.5f && pValues[2] < 0.5f )
01593                 fCriticalPValue = (float) max(pValues[0], (float) max(pValues[1], pValues[2]));
01594         else if ( pValues[0] > 0.5f && pValues[1] > 0.5f && pValues[2] > 0.5f )
01595                 fCriticalPValue = (float) min(pValues[0], (float) min(pValues[1], pValues[2]));
01596         pCompData->ChangePValue = fCriticalPValue;
01597 }
01598 
01599 //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
01600 
01601 void CExpressionAlgorithmImplementation::ComputeIntensityDependentSignificances(float &gamma1, float &gamma2,
01602                                                                                                          vector<float> & PMe,
01603                                                                                                          vector<float> & PMb)
01604 {
01605         float p1 = m_Params.IntensityLowPercent / 100;
01606         float p2 = 1.0f - m_Params.IntensityHighPercent / 100;
01607         
01608         float TPb = (float)trimMean(PMb, p1, p2);
01609         float TPe = (float)trimMean(PMe, p1, p2);
01610 
01611         float bc = sqrt(TPb * TPe);
01612         float bLow = bc * m_Params.BLCoef;
01613         float bHigh = bc * m_Params.BHCoef;
01614 
01615         int size = (int) PMe.size();
01616         vector<float> gMean(size);
01617         for (int i=0; i<size; i++)
01618         {
01619                 gMean[i] = sqrt(PMb[i] * PMe[i]);
01620         }
01621         float c = m_Params.TuningConstantCGammas;
01622         float epsilon = m_Params.EpsilonGammas;
01623 
01624         float bwGM = OneStepBiweightAlgorithm(gMean, c, epsilon);
01625 
01626         gamma1 = trimmedInterpolation(bwGM, bLow, bHigh, m_Params.Gamma1H, m_Params.Gamma1L);
01627         gamma2 = trimmedInterpolation(bwGM, bLow, bHigh, m_Params.Gamma2H, m_Params.Gamma2L);
01628 }
01629 
01630 //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
01631 
01632 void CExpressionAlgorithmImplementation::ComputeProbeLogRatio
01633 (
01634         vector<vector<float> > & PVb,
01635         vector<vector<float> > & PVe,
01636         vector<vector<bool> > & UseAtomB,
01637         vector<vector<bool> > & UseAtomE,
01638         vector<vector<float> > & PLR
01639 )
01640 {
01641         int nProbeSet = (int) PVe.size();
01642         for (int i=0; i<nProbeSet; i++)
01643         {
01644                 int nProbePair = (int) PVe[i].size();
01645                 PLR[i].resize(nProbePair);
01646                 int nProbePairUsed = 0;
01647                 for (int j=0; j<nProbePair; j++)
01648                 {
01649                         if (UseAtomB[i][j] && UseAtomE[i][j])
01650                         {
01651                                 PLR[i][nProbePairUsed] = PVe[i][j] - PVb[i][j];
01652                                 nProbePairUsed++;
01653                         }
01654                 }
01655                 PLR[i].resize(nProbePairUsed);
01656         }
01657 }
01658 
01659 //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
01660 
01661 void CExpressionAlgorithmImplementation::ComputeAvgLogRatio
01662 (
01663         vector<vector<float> > & PLR,
01664         vector<float> & avgLogRatio
01665 )
01666 {
01667         int nProbeSet = (int) PLR.size();
01668         float c = m_Params.TuningConstantCAvgLogRatio;
01669         float epsilon = m_Params.EpsilonAvgLogRatio;
01670         for (int i=0; i<nProbeSet; i++)
01671         {
01672                 avgLogRatio[i] = OneStepBiweightAlgorithm(PLR[i], c, epsilon);
01673         }
01674 }
01675 
01676 //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
01677 
01678 void CExpressionAlgorithmImplementation::BuildTTable(float level)
01679 {
01680         static const int T_TABLE_SIZE = 50;
01681         m_tTable.clear();
01682         m_tTable.resize(T_TABLE_SIZE, 0.0f);
01683         for (int i = 0; i < T_TABLE_SIZE; ++i) 
01684         {
01685                 double df = 0.7 * i;
01686                 if (df < 1.0) {
01687                         df = 1;
01688                 }
01689                 m_tTable[i] = (float)tCDFinversed(level, df);
01690         }
01691 }
01692 
01693 //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
01694 
01695 void CExpressionAlgorithmImplementation::ComputeFoldChange
01696 (
01697         vector<vector<float> > & PVb,
01698         vector<vector<float> > & PVe,
01699         vector<vector<bool> > & UseAtomB,
01700         vector<vector<bool> > & UseAtomE
01701 )
01702 {
01703         // Compute fold change
01704         int nProbeSet = (int) PVe.size();
01705         vector<vector<float> > PLR(nProbeSet);
01706         vector<float> avgLogRatio(nProbeSet);
01707 
01708         ComputeProbeLogRatio(PVb, PVe, UseAtomB, UseAtomE, PLR);
01709         ComputeAvgLogRatio(PLR, avgLogRatio);
01710 
01711         vector<float> uncertainty(nProbeSet);
01712         float avgLogRatioLow;
01713         float avgLogRatioHigh;
01714         float c = m_Params.TuningConstantCAvgLogRatio;
01715         float epsilon = m_Params.EpsilonAvgLogRatio;
01716 
01717         // Store the fold changes and confidence intervals to the chip file.
01718         int UnitsPerChip = m_Cdf.GetHeader().GetNumProbeSets();
01719         BuildTTable(m_Params.RelConfInterval);
01720 
01721         for (int iUnit=0; iUnit<UnitsPerChip; iUnit++)
01722         {
01723                 CompStatExpressionProbeSetResultType *pUnitResult =
01724                         (CompStatExpressionProbeSetResultType *) m_CompStatResults[iUnit];
01725 
01726                 pUnitResult->SignalLogRatio = avgLogRatio[iUnit];
01727 
01728                 int size = (int) PLR[iUnit].size();
01729                 float tvalue = vGetT(size, m_tTable, m_Params.RelConfInterval);         
01730 
01731                 uncertainty[iUnit] = UncertaintyOfEstimate(PLR[iUnit], c, epsilon);
01732                 float confidence = tvalue * uncertainty[iUnit];
01733                 avgLogRatioLow = avgLogRatio[iUnit] - confidence;
01734                 avgLogRatioHigh = avgLogRatio[iUnit] + confidence;
01735 
01736                 pUnitResult->SignalLogRatioLow = avgLogRatioLow;
01737                 pUnitResult->SignalLogRatioHigh = avgLogRatioHigh;
01738         }
01739 }
01740 
01741 //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
01742 
01743 void CExpressionAlgorithmImplementation::DetermineNormFactor
01744 (
01745         vector<AbsStatExpressionProbeSetResultType *> &expStatResults,
01746         vector<AbsStatExpressionProbeSetResultType *> &baselineStatResults
01747 )
01748 {
01749         int iUnit;
01750         float normFactor=0.0f;
01751 
01752         // User defined norm factor.
01753         if (m_Params.NormMethod == CExpStatAlgSettings::DEFINED_NORMALIZATION_FACTOR)
01754                 return;
01755 
01756 
01757 
01758         // Loop over all of the units.
01759         int UnitsPerChip = m_Cdf.GetHeader().GetNumProbeSets();
01760         vector<float> expList(UnitsPerChip);
01761         vector<float> baseList(UnitsPerChip);
01762         int unitCount=0;
01763         int baseunitCount=0;
01764         string probeSetName;
01765         for (iUnit=0; iUnit<UnitsPerChip; iUnit++)
01766         {
01767                 // Determine if unit should be used.
01768                 probeSetName = m_Cdf.GetProbeSetName(iUnit);
01769                 if (m_Params.NormMethod == CExpStatAlgSettings::NORM_TO_ALL_PROBE_SETS ||
01770                         UseUnitInNormFactor(probeSetName, m_Params.NormGenes))
01771                 {
01772                         if (expStatResults[iUnit]->NumUsedPairs != 0)
01773                         {
01774                                 expList[unitCount] = expStatResults[iUnit]->Signal;
01775                                 unitCount++;
01776                         }
01777 
01778                         if (baselineStatResults[iUnit]->NumUsedPairs != 0)
01779                         {
01780                                 baseList[baseunitCount] = baselineStatResults[iUnit]->Signal;
01781                                 baseunitCount++;
01782                         }
01783                 }
01784         }
01785 
01786         expList.resize(unitCount);
01787         baseList.resize(baseunitCount);
01788 
01789         // Compute the ratio of the intensities.
01790         float p1 = m_Params.IntensityLowPercent / 100;
01791         float p2 = 1.0f - m_Params.IntensityHighPercent / 100;
01792         float avgB = (float)trimMean(baseList, p1, p2);
01793         float avgE = (float)trimMean(expList, p1, p2);
01794 
01795         if (avgE != 0.0f)
01796         {
01797                 normFactor = avgB / avgE;
01798                 float diffNF = fabs(normFactor - 1.0f);
01799                 if (diffNF < 0.000001f)
01800                         normFactor = 1.0f;
01801         }
01802         else
01803                 normFactor = 1.0f;
01804 
01805         // Store the norm factor
01806         if (unitCount == 0)
01807                 normFactor = 1.0f;
01808 
01809         m_Params.NormFactor = normFactor;
01810 }
01811 
01812 //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
01813 
01814 void CExpressionAlgorithmImplementation::ComputeExpressionStat
01815 (
01816         FusionCELData *pCell,
01817         int iUnit,
01818         AbsStatExpressionProbeSetResultType *pUnit
01819 )
01820 {
01821         FusionCDFProbeSetInformation unit;
01822         FusionCDFProbeGroupInformation blk;
01823         FusionCDFProbeInformation pmCell;
01824         FusionCDFProbeInformation mmCell;
01825 
01826         m_Cdf.GetProbeSetInformation(iUnit, unit);
01827         unit.GetGroupInformation(0, blk);
01828         int numCells = blk.GetNumCells();
01829 
01830         // Loop over the cells in the unit
01831         vector<double> discMinusTau(blk.GetNumLists());
01832         int ctr = 0;
01833         int iCell;
01834         for (iCell=0; iCell<numCells; iCell+=2)
01835         {
01836                 blk.GetCell(iCell, pmCell);
01837                 blk.GetCell(iCell+1, mmCell);
01838 
01839                 if (IsMasked(pCell, pmCell.GetX(), pmCell.GetY()) == false &&
01840                         IsMasked(pCell, mmCell.GetX(), mmCell.GetY()) == false)
01841                 {
01842                         double pmI = pCell->GetIntensity(pmCell.GetX(), pmCell.GetY());
01843                         double mmI = pCell->GetIntensity(mmCell.GetX(), mmCell.GetY());
01844 
01845                         // Exclude saturated probe pair.
01846                         if (mmI < m_Params.SaturatedIntensity)
01847                         {
01848                                 double sum = pmI + mmI;
01849                                 double tau1 = m_Params.Tau;
01850                                 if (sum > 0.0f)
01851                                         discMinusTau[ctr] = ((pmI - mmI) / sum) - tau1;
01852                                 else
01853                                         discMinusTau[ctr] =  -tau1;
01854                                 ctr ++;
01855                         }
01856                 }
01857         }
01858 
01859         pUnit->NumPairs = blk.GetNumLists();
01860 
01861         // Compute the absolute call.
01862         if (ctr <= 0)
01863         {
01864                 pUnit->Detection = EXP_NO_ABS_CALL_TYPE;
01865                 pUnit->Signal = -1.0f;
01866                 pUnit->DetectionPValue = 0.0f;
01867                 pUnit->NumUsedPairs = 0;
01868         }
01869         else
01870         {
01871                 discMinusTau.resize(ctr);
01872                 ExpResults result;
01873                 float medianValue = 0.0f;
01874                 if (discMinusTau.size() > 0) {
01875                         medianValue = m_Params.Tau + median(discMinusTau);
01876                         result = newSignRank(discMinusTau, (float) m_Params.Alpha1, (float) m_Params.Alpha2);
01877                 }
01878                 else
01879                 {
01880                         result.call = 2;
01881                         result.p_value = 0.0f;
01882                 }
01883                 pUnit->DetectionPValue = (float)result.p_value;
01884                 ComputeAbsoluteCall(pUnit, &result);
01885                 pUnit->NumUsedPairs = ctr;
01886         }
01887 }
01888 
01889 //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
01890 
01891 bool CExpressionAlgorithmImplementation::AllMaskedOut(FusionCELData *pCell)
01892 {
01893         int nUnits;
01894         int iUnit;
01895         int nCells;
01896         int iCell;
01897         FusionCDFProbeSetInformation unit;
01898         FusionCDFProbeGroupInformation blk;
01899         FusionCDFProbeInformation cell;
01900 
01901         // Get number of units.
01902         nUnits = m_Cdf.GetHeader().GetNumProbeSets();
01903 
01904         // Loop over all units.
01905         for (iUnit=0; iUnit<nUnits; ++iUnit)
01906         {
01907                 if (m_Cdf.GetProbeSetType(iUnit) != affxcdf::ExpressionProbeSetType)
01908                         continue;
01909 
01910                 m_Cdf.GetProbeSetInformation(iUnit, unit);
01911                 unit.GetGroupInformation(0, blk);
01912                 nCells = blk.GetNumCells();
01913                 for (iCell=0; iCell<nCells; iCell++)
01914                 {
01915                         blk.GetCell(iCell, cell);
01916                         if (IsMasked(pCell, cell.GetX(), cell.GetY()) == false)
01917                                 return false;
01918                 }
01919         }
01920         return true;
01921 }
01922 
01923 //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
01924 
01925 bool CExpressionAlgorithmImplementation::IsBlankCellFile(FusionCELData *pCell)
01926 {
01927         const float MINIMUM_CELL_INTENSITY = 0.00001f;
01928         bool bResult = true;
01929 
01930         int iUnit;
01931         int nCells;
01932         int iCell;
01933         FusionCDFProbeSetInformation unit;
01934         FusionCDFProbeGroupInformation blk;
01935         FusionCDFProbeInformation cell;
01936 
01937 
01938 
01939         // Loop over all of the units.
01940         int UnitsPerChip = m_Cdf.GetHeader().GetNumProbeSets();
01941         for (iUnit=0; iUnit<UnitsPerChip; iUnit++)
01942         {
01943                 if (m_Cdf.GetProbeSetType(iUnit) != affxcdf::ExpressionProbeSetType)
01944                         continue;
01945 
01946                 m_Cdf.GetProbeSetInformation(iUnit, unit);
01947                 unit.GetGroupInformation(0, blk);
01948                 nCells = blk.GetNumCells();
01949                 for (iCell=0; iCell<nCells; iCell++)
01950                 {
01951                         blk.GetCell(iCell, cell);
01952                         if (pCell->GetIntensity(cell.GetX(), cell.GetY()) > MINIMUM_CELL_INTENSITY)
01953                         {
01954                                 bResult = false;
01955                                 break;
01956                         }
01957                 }
01958         }
01959 
01960         return bResult;
01961 }
01962 
01963 //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
01964 
01965 void CExpressionAlgorithmImplementation::ComputeScaledAdjustedIntensity(
01966                                                                                           FusionCELData *pCell,
01967                                                                                           vector<vector<float> > & PM,
01968                                                                                           vector<vector<float> > & MM,
01969                                                                                           vector<vector<bool> > &UseAtom,
01970                                                                                           vector<vector<FloatPair> > & BG,
01971                                                                                           vector<vector<FloatPair> > & Noise,
01972                                                                                           AllZonesInfoType & ZonesInfo,
01973                                                                                           vector<float> & FeatureIntensity)
01974 {
01975         int iUnit;
01976         int CellsRemaining;
01977         int zonex;
01978         int zoney;
01979         int NumberZones;
01980         // int iInten=0; // unused pk
01981 
01982         int *NumberCellsPerZone=NULL;
01983 
01984         // Determine the number of remaining cells in the vertical direction.
01985         CellsRemaining = m_Cdf.GetHeader().GetCols() % m_Params.NumberVertZones;
01986         if(CellsRemaining != 0)
01987         {
01988                 zonex = (m_Cdf.GetHeader().GetCols() + 
01989                                 (int)m_Params.NumberVertZones - CellsRemaining) /
01990                                 (int)m_Params.NumberVertZones;
01991         }
01992         else
01993         {
