01994                 zonex = m_Cdf.GetHeader().GetCols() / m_Params.NumberVertZones;
01995         }
01996 
01997         // Determine the number of remaining cells in the horizontal direction.
01998         CellsRemaining = m_Cdf.GetHeader().GetRows() % m_Params.NumberHorZones;
01999         if(CellsRemaining != 0)
02000         {
02001                 zoney = (m_Cdf.GetHeader().GetRows() +
02002                                 m_Params.NumberHorZones-CellsRemaining) /
02003                                 m_Params.NumberHorZones;
02004         }
02005         else
02006         {
02007                 zoney = m_Cdf.GetHeader().GetRows() / m_Params.NumberHorZones;
02008         }
02009 
02010         // Ensure that there are a match and mismatch cell in the same zone.
02011         zoney += zoney % 2; //EXPRESSION_ATOMS_PER_CELL;
02012 
02013         // Determine the total number of zones.
02014         NumberZones = (int)m_Params.NumberVertZones * m_Params.NumberHorZones;
02015 
02016         // Get number of units.
02017         int NumUnits = m_Cdf.GetHeader().GetNumProbeSets();
02018 
02019         // Allocate space for all atoms intensities and ID's.
02020         NumberCellsPerZone = new int[NumberZones];
02021 
02022         // Clear arrays.
02023         memset(NumberCellsPerZone, 0, sizeof(int)*NumberZones);
02024 
02025         // Loop over all units to determine the zone ID's and intensities.
02026         vector<vector<float> > ZoneCells(NumberZones);
02027         FusionCDFProbeSetInformation unit;
02028         FusionCDFProbeGroupInformation blk;
02029         FusionCDFProbeInformation cell;
02030         bool bMasked;
02031         for (iUnit = 0; iUnit < NumUnits; ++iUnit)
02032         {
02033                 m_Cdf.GetProbeSetInformation(iUnit, unit);
02034 
02035                 // Only process expression units.
02036                 if (unit.GetProbeSetType() == affxcdf::ExpressionProbeSetType)
02037                 {
02038                         unit.GetGroupInformation(0, blk);
02039                         int numCells = blk.GetNumCells();
02040 
02041                         // Loop over the atoms in the unit
02042                         for (int iCell = 0; iCell < numCells; iCell++)
02043                         {
02044                                 blk.GetCell(iCell, cell);
02045                                 bMasked = IsMasked(pCell, cell.GetX(), cell.GetY());
02046                                 if (bMasked == false)
02047                                 {
02048                                         int nZone;
02049                                         nZone = DetermineZone(cell.GetX(), cell.GetY(), zonex, zoney);
02050                                         ZoneCells[nZone].resize(ZoneCells[nZone].size() + 1);
02051                                         ZoneCells[nZone][NumberCellsPerZone[nZone]] =
02052                                                 pCell->GetIntensity(cell.GetX(), cell.GetY());
02053 
02054                                         if (nZone >= 0 && nZone < NumberZones)
02055                                                 NumberCellsPerZone[nZone]++;
02056                                 }
02057                         }
02058                 }
02059         }
02060 
02061         // Allocate zones, set smooth factor and set num zones
02062         ZonesInfo.pZones = new ZoneInfo[NumberZones];
02063         ZonesInfo.number_zones = NumberZones;
02064         ZonesInfo.smooth_factor = m_Params.SmoothFactorBG;
02065 
02066         // compute background for each zone
02067         for (int iZone = 0; iZone < NumberZones; iZone++)
02068         {
02069                 // Compute the center coordinates of each zone.
02070                 // (x1,y1) is the upper left corner
02071                 // (x2,y2) is the lower right corner
02072                 float x1 = ((int) (iZone % m_Params.NumberVertZones)) * zonex;
02073                 float y1 = ((int) (iZone / m_Params.NumberVertZones)) * zoney;
02074                 float x2 = x1 + zonex;
02075                 float y2 = y1 + zoney;
02076                 ZonesInfo.pZones[iZone].center.x = (x1 + x2) / 2;
02077                 ZonesInfo.pZones[iZone].center.y = (y1 + y2) / 2;
02078 
02079                 int iCell=0;
02080                 int numCell = NumberCellsPerZone[iZone];
02081                 ZonesInfo.pZones[iZone].numCell = numCell;
02082 
02083                 vector<float> zoneI(numCell);
02084                 vector<int> rank(numCell);
02085 
02086                 for (int i = 0; i < numCell; i++)
02087                 {
02088                         float inten = ZoneCells[iZone][i];
02089                         zoneI[iCell] = ModifyIntensitySlightly(inten);
02090                         iCell++;
02091                 }
02092                 float lowBG = 0.0f;
02093                 float highBG = m_Params.NumberBGCells / 100.0f;
02094                 FloatPair fp = trimMeanAndStd(zoneI, lowBG, highBG);
02095                 ZonesInfo.pZones[iZone].background = fp.value1;
02096                 ZonesInfo.pZones[iZone].noise = fp.value2;
02097         }  
02098         // End of computing background intensity and noise for each zone.
02099         // Carried zones and NumberZones as the required information.
02100 
02101         // Compute b(x,y), n(x,y), SA(x,y) which was stored in PM[i][j] and MM[i][j]
02102         float smoothF = m_Params.SmoothFactorBG;
02103 
02104         FusionCDFProbeInformation pmcell;
02105         FusionCDFProbeInformation mmcell;
02106         for (iUnit=0; iUnit<NumUnits; ++iUnit)
02107         {
02108                 m_Cdf.GetProbeSetInformation(iUnit, unit);
02109 
02110                 // Only process expression units.
02111                 if (unit.GetProbeSetType() == affxcdf::ExpressionProbeSetType)
02112                 {
02113                         unit.GetGroupInformation(0, blk);
02114                         int numCells = blk.GetNumCells();
02115                         int nAtoms = blk.GetNumLists();
02116 
02117                         PM[iUnit].resize(nAtoms, 0.0);
02118                         MM[iUnit].resize(nAtoms, 0.0);
02119                         UseAtom[iUnit].resize(nAtoms, true);
02120 
02121                         BG[iUnit].resize(nAtoms);
02122                         Noise[iUnit].resize(nAtoms);
02123 
02124                         // Loop over the atoms in the unit
02125                         int atomCount = 0;
02126                         for (int iCell=0, iAtom=0; iCell<numCells; iCell+=2, ++iAtom)
02127                         {
02128                                 blk.GetCell(iCell, pmcell);
02129                                 blk.GetCell(iCell+1, mmcell);
02130                                 bMasked = (IsMasked(pCell, pmcell.GetX(), pmcell.GetY()) == true) ||
02131                                                           (IsMasked(pCell, mmcell.GetX(), mmcell.GetY()) == true);
02132                                 if (bMasked == true)
02133                                 {
02134                                                 UseAtom[iUnit][iAtom] = false;
02135                                 }
02136 
02137                                 // Set the background (with smoothing adjustment) for matchcell.
02138                                 Coordinate Cellxy;
02139                                 Cellxy.x = pmcell.GetX();
02140                                 Cellxy.y = pmcell.GetY();
02141                                 float WeightedSumBg = 0.0f;
02142                                 float WeightedSumNoise = 0.0f;
02143                                 float WeightedSumDenom = 0.0f;
02144                                 float background = 0.0f;
02145                                 float noise = 0.0f;
02146                                 int k;
02147                                 for (k = 0; k < NumberZones; k++)
02148                                 {
02149                                         WeightedSumBg    += ComputeWeightAtXY(Cellxy.x, Cellxy.y, ZonesInfo.pZones[k].center.x, ZonesInfo.pZones[k].center.y, smoothF) * ZonesInfo.pZones[k].background;
02150                                         WeightedSumNoise += ComputeWeightAtXY(Cellxy.x, Cellxy.y, ZonesInfo.pZones[k].center.x, ZonesInfo.pZones[k].center.y, smoothF) * ZonesInfo.pZones[k].noise;
02151                                         WeightedSumDenom += ComputeWeightAtXY(Cellxy.x, Cellxy.y, ZonesInfo.pZones[k].center.x, ZonesInfo.pZones[k].center.y, smoothF); 
02152                                 }
02153                                 if (WeightedSumDenom != 0.0f)
02154                                 {
02155                                         background = WeightedSumBg / WeightedSumDenom;
02156                                         noise = WeightedSumNoise / WeightedSumDenom;
02157                                 }
02158 
02159                                 BG[iUnit][iAtom].value1 = background;
02160                                 Noise[iUnit][iAtom].value1 = noise;
02161 
02162                                 //float smoothFactor;
02163                                 float scaledAdjustedI;
02164                                 float inten;
02165                                 float modifiedI;
02166 
02167                                 inten = pCell->GetIntensity((int)Cellxy.x,(int)Cellxy.y);
02168                                 modifiedI = ModifyIntensitySlightly(inten);
02169                                 scaledAdjustedI = ComputeAdjustedIntensity(modifiedI, background, noise);
02170                                 PM[iUnit][iAtom] = scaledAdjustedI;
02171                                 
02172                                 //////////////////////////////////////////////////////
02173                                 // Compute Mis-match intensities
02174                                 //////////////////////////////////////////////////////
02175                                 Cellxy.x = mmcell.GetX();
02176                                 Cellxy.y = mmcell.GetY();
02177                                 WeightedSumBg = 0.0f;
02178                                 WeightedSumNoise = 0.0f;
02179                                 WeightedSumDenom = 0.0f;
02180                                 background = 0.0f;
02181                                 noise = 0.0f;
02182                                 for (k = 0; k < NumberZones; k++)
02183                                 {
02184                                         WeightedSumBg    += ComputeWeightAtXY(Cellxy.x, Cellxy.y, ZonesInfo.pZones[k].center.x, ZonesInfo.pZones[k].center.y, smoothF) * ZonesInfo.pZones[k].background;
02185                                         WeightedSumNoise += ComputeWeightAtXY(Cellxy.x, Cellxy.y, ZonesInfo.pZones[k].center.x, ZonesInfo.pZones[k].center.y, smoothF) * ZonesInfo.pZones[k].noise;
02186                                         WeightedSumDenom += ComputeWeightAtXY(Cellxy.x, Cellxy.y, ZonesInfo.pZones[k].center.x, ZonesInfo.pZones[k].center.y, smoothF); 
02187                                 }
02188                                 if (WeightedSumDenom != 0.0f)
02189                                 {
02190                                         background = WeightedSumBg / WeightedSumDenom;
02191                                         noise = WeightedSumNoise / WeightedSumDenom;
02192                                 }
02193 
02194                                 BG[iUnit][iAtom].value2 = background;
02195                                 Noise[iUnit][iAtom].value2 = noise;
02196 
02197                                 inten = pCell->GetIntensity((int)Cellxy.x,(int)Cellxy.y);
02198                                 modifiedI = ModifyIntensitySlightly(inten);
02199                                 scaledAdjustedI = ComputeAdjustedIntensity(modifiedI, background, noise);
02200                                 MM[iUnit][iAtom] = scaledAdjustedI;
02201 
02202                                 atomCount++;
02203                         }
02204                         PM[iUnit].resize(atomCount);
02205                         MM[iUnit].resize(atomCount);
02206                 } // if expression type 
02207         } // for each unit
02208 
02209         // If a cel file with adjusted intensities is requested, loop over all probes.
02210         if (m_WriteCell)
02211         {
02212                 FeatureIntensity.resize(m_NumFeatures);
02213                 const int colCount = m_Cdf.GetHeader().GetCols();
02214                 const int rowCount = m_Cdf.GetHeader().GetRows();
02215                 for (int colIx = 0; colIx < colCount; ++colIx)
02216                         for (int rowIx = 0; rowIx < rowCount; ++rowIx)
02217                         {
02218                                 float WeightedSumBg = 0.0f;
02219                                 float WeightedSumNoise = 0.0f;
02220                                 float WeightedSumDenom = 0.0f;
02221                                 float background = 0.0f;
02222                                 float noise = 0.0f;
02223                                 for (int k = 0; k < NumberZones; k++)
02224                                 {
02225                                         WeightedSumBg    += ComputeWeightAtXY(colIx, rowIx, ZonesInfo.pZones[k].center.x, ZonesInfo.pZones[k].center.y, smoothF) * ZonesInfo.pZones[k].background;
02226                                         WeightedSumNoise += ComputeWeightAtXY(colIx, rowIx, ZonesInfo.pZones[k].center.x, ZonesInfo.pZones[k].center.y, smoothF) * ZonesInfo.pZones[k].noise;
02227                                         WeightedSumDenom += ComputeWeightAtXY(colIx, rowIx, ZonesInfo.pZones[k].center.x, ZonesInfo.pZones[k].center.y, smoothF); 
02228                                 }
02229                                 if (WeightedSumDenom != 0.0f)
02230                                 {
02231                                         background = WeightedSumBg / WeightedSumDenom;
02232                                         noise = WeightedSumNoise / WeightedSumDenom;
02233                                 }
02234         
02235                                 float inten = pCell->GetIntensity(colIx,rowIx);
02236                                 float modifiedI = ModifyIntensitySlightly(inten);
02237                                 float scaledAdjustedI = ComputeAdjustedIntensity(modifiedI, background, noise);
02238                                 int xyindex = m_Cell.XYToIndex(colIx,rowIx);
02239                                 FeatureIntensity[xyindex] = scaledAdjustedI;
02240                         }
02241         }
02242 
02243         //Clean up
02244         delete [] NumberCellsPerZone;   
02245 }
02246 
02247 //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
02248 
02249 void CExpressionAlgorithmImplementation::ComputeBackGroundZones(
02250                                                                                           FusionCELData *pCell,
02251                                                                                           AllZonesInfoType & ZonesInfo,
02252                                                                                           vector<float> & FeatureIntensity)
02253 {
02254         int iUnit;
02255         int CellsRemaining;
02256         int zonex;
02257         int zoney;
02258         int NumberZones;
02259         // int iInten=0; // unused pk
02260 
02261         int *NumberCellsPerZone=NULL;
02262 
02263         // Determine the number of remaining cells in the vertical direction.
02264         CellsRemaining = m_Cdf.GetHeader().GetCols() % m_Params.NumberVertZones;
02265         if(CellsRemaining != 0)
02266         {
02267                 zonex = (m_Cdf.GetHeader().GetCols() + 
02268                                 (int)m_Params.NumberVertZones - CellsRemaining) /
02269                                 (int)m_Params.NumberVertZones;
02270         }
02271         else
02272         {
02273                 zonex = m_Cdf.GetHeader().GetCols() / m_Params.NumberVertZones;
02274         }
02275 
02276         // Determine the number of remaining cells in the horizontal direction.
02277         CellsRemaining = m_Cdf.GetHeader().GetRows() % m_Params.NumberHorZones;
02278         if(CellsRemaining != 0)
02279         {
02280                 zoney = (m_Cdf.GetHeader().GetRows() +
02281                                 m_Params.NumberHorZones-CellsRemaining) /
02282                                 m_Params.NumberHorZones;
02283         }
02284         else
02285         {
02286                 zoney = m_Cdf.GetHeader().GetRows() / m_Params.NumberHorZones;
02287         }
02288 
02289         // Ensure that there are a match and mismatch cell in the same zone.
02290         zoney += zoney % 2; //EXPRESSION_ATOMS_PER_CELL;
02291 
02292         // Determine the total number of zones.
02293         NumberZones = (int)m_Params.NumberVertZones * m_Params.NumberHorZones;
02294 
02295         // Get number of units.
02296         int NumUnits = m_Cdf.GetHeader().GetNumProbeSets();
02297 
02298         // Allocate space for all atoms intensities and ID's.
02299         NumberCellsPerZone = new int[NumberZones];
02300 
02301         // Clear arrays.
02302         memset(NumberCellsPerZone, 0, sizeof(int)*NumberZones);
02303 
02304         // Loop over all units to determine the zone ID's and intensities.
02305         vector<vector<float> > ZoneCells(NumberZones);
02306         FusionCDFProbeSetInformation unit;
02307         FusionCDFProbeGroupInformation blk;
02308         FusionCDFProbeInformation cell;
02309         bool bMasked;
02310         for (iUnit = 0; iUnit < NumUnits; ++iUnit)
02311         {
02312                 m_Cdf.GetProbeSetInformation(iUnit, unit);
02313 
02314                 // Only process expression units.
02315                 if (unit.GetProbeSetType() == affxcdf::ExpressionProbeSetType)
02316                 {
02317                         unit.GetGroupInformation(0, blk);
02318                         int numCells = blk.GetNumCells();
02319 
02320                         // Loop over the atoms in the unit
02321                         for (int iCell = 0; iCell < numCells; iCell++)
02322                         {
02323                                 blk.GetCell(iCell, cell);
02324                                 bMasked = IsMasked(pCell, cell.GetX(), cell.GetY());
02325                                 if (bMasked == false)
02326                                 {
02327                                         int nZone;
02328                                         nZone = DetermineZone(cell.GetX(), cell.GetY(), zonex, zoney);
02329                                         ZoneCells[nZone].resize(ZoneCells[nZone].size() + 1);
02330                                         ZoneCells[nZone][NumberCellsPerZone[nZone]] =
02331                                                 pCell->GetIntensity(cell.GetX(), cell.GetY());
02332 
02333                                         if (nZone >= 0 && nZone < NumberZones)
02334                                                 NumberCellsPerZone[nZone]++;
02335                                 }
02336                         }
02337                 }
02338         }
02339 
02340         // Allocate zones, set smooth factor and set num zones
02341         ZonesInfo.pZones = new ZoneInfo[NumberZones];
02342         ZonesInfo.number_zones = NumberZones;
02343         ZonesInfo.smooth_factor = m_Params.SmoothFactorBG;
02344 
02345         // compute background for each zone
02346         for (int iZone = 0; iZone < NumberZones; iZone++)
02347         {
02348                 // Compute the center coordinates of each zone.
02349                 // (x1,y1) is the upper left corner
02350                 // (x2,y2) is the lower right corner
02351                 float x1 = ((int) (iZone % m_Params.NumberVertZones)) * zonex;
02352                 float y1 = ((int) (iZone / m_Params.NumberVertZones)) * zoney;
02353                 float x2 = x1 + zonex;
02354                 float y2 = y1 + zoney;
02355                 ZonesInfo.pZones[iZone].center.x = (x1 + x2) / 2;
02356                 ZonesInfo.pZones[iZone].center.y = (y1 + y2) / 2;
02357 
02358                 int iCell=0;
02359                 int numCell = NumberCellsPerZone[iZone];
02360                 ZonesInfo.pZones[iZone].numCell = numCell;
02361 
02362                 vector<float> zoneI(numCell);
02363                 vector<int> rank(numCell);
02364 
02365                 for (int i = 0; i < numCell; i++)
02366                 {
02367                         float inten = ZoneCells[iZone][i];
02368                         zoneI[iCell] = ModifyIntensitySlightly(inten);
02369                         iCell++;
02370                 }
02371                 float lowBG = 0.0f;
02372                 float highBG = m_Params.NumberBGCells / 100.0f;
02373                 FloatPair fp = trimMeanAndStd(zoneI, lowBG, highBG);
02374                 ZonesInfo.pZones[iZone].background = fp.value1;
02375                 ZonesInfo.pZones[iZone].noise = fp.value2;
02376         }
02377 
02378         //Clean up
02379         delete [] NumberCellsPerZone;   
02380 }
02381 
02382 
02383 //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
02384 
02385 void CExpressionAlgorithmImplementation::ComputeMeasurement(vector<vector<float> > & PM,
02386                                                                   vector<vector<float> > & MM,
02387                                                                   vector<vector<bool> > & UseAtom,
02388                                                                   vector<float> & avgMeasurement,
02389                                                                   vector<vector<float> > & PV)
02390 {
02391         // Compute the typical difference (for each probe set) of log(PM) over log(MM).
02392         int nProbeSet = (int) PM.size(); //  Number of Probe Set
02393 
02394         // Compute Contrast Value
02395         vector<vector<float> > CT(nProbeSet);
02396         ComputeContrastValue(PM, MM, CT);
02397 
02398         // Compute Probe Value
02399         ComputeProbeValue(PM, CT, PV);
02400 
02401         // Compute Average Log Intensity for probe set i and its confidence interval.
02402         float c = m_Params.TuningConstantCAvgLogInten;
02403         float epsilon = m_Params.EpsilonAvgLogInten;
02404 
02405         vector<vector<float> > PVused(nProbeSet);
02406         GetUsedSet(PV, UseAtom, PVused);
02407 
02408         vector<float> uncertainty(nProbeSet);
02409         for (int i=0; i<nProbeSet; i++)
02410         {
02411                 avgMeasurement[i] = OneStepBiweightAlgorithm(PVused[i], c, epsilon);
02412                 avgMeasurement[i] = antiLog(avgMeasurement[i]);
02413         }
02414 }
02415 
02416 //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
02417 
02418 void CExpressionAlgorithmImplementation::GetUsedSet(vector<vector<float> > & InputSet,
02419                                                   vector<vector<bool> > & UseAtom,
02420                                                   vector<vector<float> > & UsedSet)
02421 {
02422         int nProbeSet = (int) InputSet.size();
02423         for (int i=0; i<nProbeSet; i++)
02424         {
02425                 int size = (int) InputSet[i].size();
02426                 UsedSet[i].resize(size);
02427                 int used = 0;
02428                 for (int j=0; j<size; j++)
02429                 {
02430                         if (UseAtom[i][j])
02431                         {
02432                                 UsedSet[i][used] = InputSet[i][j];
02433                                 used++;
02434                         }
02435                 }
02436                 UsedSet[i].resize(used);
02437         }
02438 }
02439 
02440 //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
02441 
02442 void CExpressionAlgorithmImplementation::ComputeContrastValue(vector<vector<float> > & PM,
02443                                                                         vector<vector<float> > & MM,
02444                                                                         vector<vector<float> > & CT)
02445 {
02446         int nProbeSet = (int) PM.size();
02447         vector<float> SB(nProbeSet);
02448         ComputeTypicalDifference(PM, MM, SB);
02449         float ContrastTau = m_Params.ContrastTau;
02450         for (int i=0; i<nProbeSet; i++)
02451         {
02452                 int nProbePair = (int) PM[i].size();
02453                 CT[i].resize(nProbePair);
02454                 for (int j=0; j<nProbePair; j++)
02455                 {
02456                         if (MM[i][j] < PM[i][j])
02457                         {
02458                                 CT[i][j] = MM[i][j];
02459                         }
02460                         else if ((MM[i][j] >= PM[i][j]) &&
02461                                          (SB[i] > ContrastTau))
02462                         {
02463                                 CT[i][j] = PM[i][j] / (float)antiLog(SB[i]);
02464                         }
02465                         else if ((MM[i][j] >= PM[i][j]) &&
02466                                          (SB[i] <= ContrastTau))
02467                         {
02468                                 CT[i][j] = PM[i][j] / (float)antiLog(ContrastTau / (1.0 + (ContrastTau - SB[i]) / m_Params.ScaleTau) );
02469                         }
02470                 }
02471         }
02472 }
02473 
02474 //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
02475 
02476 void CExpressionAlgorithmImplementation::ComputeProbeValue(vector<vector<float> > & PM,
02477                                                                  vector<vector<float> > & CT,
02478                                                                  vector<vector<float> > & PV)
02479 {
02480         int nProbeSet = (int) PM.size();
02481         float delta = m_Params.Delta;
02482         float correction = 1.0f + m_Params.BiasCorrect;
02483         for (int i=0; i<nProbeSet; i++)
02484         {
02485                 int nProbePair = (int) PM[i].size();
02486                 PV[i].resize(nProbePair);
02487                 for (int j=0; j<nProbePair; j++)
02488                 {
02489                         float v = PM[i][j] - CT[i][j];
02490                         if (v < delta)
02491                                 PV[i][j] = correction * (float)logtwo(delta);
02492                         else
02493                                 PV[i][j] = correction * (float)logtwo(v);
02494                 }
02495         }
02496 }
02497 
02498 //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
02499 
02500 void CExpressionAlgorithmImplementation::ComputeTypicalDifference(vector<vector<float> > & PM,
02501                                                                                 vector<vector<float> > & MM,
02502                                                                                 vector<float> & SB)
02503 {
02504         int nProbeSet = (int) PM.size();
02505         vector<vector<float> > logPM_minus_logMM(nProbeSet);
02506         float c = m_Params.TuningConstantCSB;
02507         float epsilon = m_Params.EpsilonSB;
02508 
02509         for (int i=0; i<nProbeSet; i++)
02510         {
02511                 int nProbePair = (int) PM[i].size(); // Number of Probe Pair in Probe Set i
02512                 logPM_minus_logMM[i].resize(nProbePair);
02513                 for (int j=0; j<nProbePair; j++)
02514                 {
02515                         logPM_minus_logMM[i][j] = logtwo(PM[i][j]) - logtwo(MM[i][j]);
02516                 }
02517                 SB[i] = OneStepBiweightAlgorithm(logPM_minus_logMM[i], c, epsilon);
02518         }
02519 }
02520 
02521 //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
02522 
02523 void CExpressionAlgorithmImplementation::ModifyIntensities
02524 (
02525         vector<AbsStatExpressionProbeSetResultType *> statResults,
02526         float factor
02527 )
02528 {
02529         // Loop over all of the units.
02530         int UnitsPerChip = m_Cdf.GetHeader().GetNumProbeSets();
02531         for (int iUnit=0; iUnit<UnitsPerChip; iUnit++)
02532         {
02533                 // Get the units.
02534                 AbsStatExpressionProbeSetResultType *pUnitResult = statResults[iUnit];
02535                 pUnitResult->Signal = (pUnitResult->Signal * factor);
02536         }
02537 }
02538 
02539 //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
02540 
02541 float CExpressionAlgorithmImplementation::DetermineScaleFactor(vector<AbsStatExpressionProbeSetResultType *> &statResults)
02542 {
02543         int iUnit;
02544         float avg = 0.0f;
02545 
02546         
02547         // User defined norm factor is already stored in the algorithm parameters.
02548         if (m_Params.SFMethod == CExpStatAlgSettings::DEFINED_SCALING_FACTOR)
02549                 return m_Params.ScaleFactor;
02550  
02551         // Loop over all of the units.
02552         int UnitsPerChip = m_Cdf.GetHeader().GetNumProbeSets();
02553         int unitCount=0;
02554         vector<float> intensityList(UnitsPerChip);
02555         string probeSetName;
02556         for (iUnit=0; iUnit<UnitsPerChip; iUnit++)
02557         {
02558                 // Get the units.
02559                 AbsStatExpressionProbeSetResultType *pUnitResult = statResults[iUnit];
02560 
02561                 // find signal only for the used genes.
02562                 probeSetName = m_Cdf.GetProbeSetName(iUnit);
02563                 if (m_Params.SFMethod == CExpStatAlgSettings::SCALE_TO_ALL_PROBE_SETS ||
02564                         UseUnitInNormFactor(probeSetName, m_Params.ScaleGenes))
02565                 {
02566                         // Use Measurement to do scale factor
02567                         if (pUnitResult->NumUsedPairs != 0)
02568                         {
02569                                 intensityList[unitCount] = pUnitResult->Signal;
02570                                 unitCount++;
02571                         }
02572                 }
02573         }
02574 
02575         intensityList.resize(unitCount);
02576 
02577         // Compute the trimMean
02578         float p1 = m_Params.IntensityLowPercent / 100;
02579         float p2 = 1.0f - m_Params.IntensityHighPercent / 100;
02580         avg = trimMean(intensityList, p1, p2);
02581 
02582         // Store the scale factor
02583         float sf=1.0f;
02584         if (unitCount && avg != 0.0f)
02585                 sf = m_Params.TGT / avg;
02586 
02587         //Check for the validity of SF
02588         if(sf <= 0)
02589         {
02590                 sf = 1.0f;
02591         }
02592         return sf;
02593 }
02594 
02595 //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
02596 
02597 bool CExpressionAlgorithmImplementation::UseUnitInNormFactor(string &probeSetName,
02598                                                                    list<string> &MaskedGenes)
02599 {
02600         bool UseUnit=false;
02601         list<string>::iterator iter;
02602         for( iter = MaskedGenes.begin(); iter != MaskedGenes.end(); ++iter)
02603         {
02604                 if (probeSetName == *iter)
02605                 {
02606                         UseUnit = true;
02607                         break;          
02608                 }
02609         }
02610         return UseUnit;
02611 }
02612 
02613 //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
02614 
02615 void CExpressionAlgorithmImplementation::ComputeAbsoluteCall(AbsStatExpressionProbeSetResultType *unit, ExpResults *res)
02616 {
02617         // Determine if the gene is present.
02618         if( res->call == 2)
02619                 unit->Detection = EXP_PRESENT_CALL_TYPE;
02620 
02621         // Determine if marginal
02622         else if ( res->call == 1)
02623                 unit->Detection = EXP_MARGINAL_CALL_TYPE;
02624 
02625         // Otherwise the gene is absent.
02626         else
02627                 unit->Detection = EXP_ABSENT_CALL_TYPE;
02628 }
02629 
02630 //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
02631 
02632 float CExpressionAlgorithmImplementation::ModifyIntensitySlightly(float intensity)
02633 {
02634         return max(intensity, m_Params.Epsilon);
02635 }
02636 
02637 //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
02638 
02639 float CExpressionAlgorithmImplementation::ComputeAdjustedIntensity(float intensity, float background, float noise)
02640 {
02641         float factoredNoise = (float) noise * m_Params.NoiseFrac;
02642         float diff = intensity - background;
02643         float adjustedI = max(max(diff, factoredNoise), 0.5f);
02644         // AlexC - 1/22/01
02645         // Code Comments:
02646         // if too frequent substitution of the noise value, alert might generated.
02647         // Refer to the page 4 of the Background and Spatial Variation Adjustement spec., 
02648         // under eq(16), it said that 
02649         // "Production software should probably alert the user if the noise value is being 
02650         //  substituted too frequently (indicating that too much data is below the noise level), 
02651         //  but an appropriate threshold value is not at present known."
02652         return adjustedI;
02653 }
02654 
02655 //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
02656 
02657 int CExpressionAlgorithmImplementation::DetermineZone(int cellx, int celly, int zonex, int zoney)
02658 {
02659         float fZx = (float) cellx / (float) zonex;
02660         float fZy = (float) celly / (float) zoney;
02661 
02662         int Zx = (int) floor(fZx);
02663         int Zy = (int) floor(fZy);
02664 
02665         int zoneID = Zx + Zy * m_Params.NumberVertZones;
02666         return zoneID;
02667 }

02669 //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
02670 
02671 void CExpressionAlgorithmImplementation::SetMeasurement
02672 (
02673         vector<vector<FloatPair> > &BG,
02674         vector<float> &avgMeasurement,
02675         vector<AbsStatExpressionProbeSetResultType *> statResults
02676 )
02677 {
02678         // FusionCDFProbeSetInformation *unit=NULL; // unused pk
02679         // FusionCDFProbeGroupInformation *blk=NULL; // unused pk
02680         // FusionCDFProbeInformation *cell=NULL; // unused pk
02681 
02682         int UnitsPerChip = m_Cdf.GetHeader().GetNumProbeSets();
02683         for (int iUnit=0; iUnit<UnitsPerChip; iUnit++)
02684         {
02685                 AbsStatExpressionProbeSetResultType *pUnitResult = statResults[iUnit];
02686                 if (pUnitResult->Detection == EXP_NO_ABS_CALL_TYPE)
02687                         pUnitResult->Signal = 0.0f;
02688                 else
02689                         pUnitResult->Signal = avgMeasurement[iUnit];
02690         }
02691 }
02692 
02693 //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
02694 
02695 float CExpressionAlgorithmImplementation::ComputeCellBackground
02696 (
02697         int x,
02698         int y,
02699         ZoneInfo *zones,
02700         int zoneSize,
02701         float smoothFactorBg
02702 )
02703 {
02704         float bkg = 0.0f;
02705         if (zones != NULL)
02706         {
02707                 float weightedSumBg = 0.0f;
02708                 float weight = 0.0f;
02709                 float weightedSumDenom = 0.0f;
02710                 float background = 0.0f;
02711 
02712                 for (int k = 0; k < zoneSize; k++)
02713                 {
02714                         weight = ComputeWeightAtXY(x, y, zones[k].center.x, zones[k].center.y, smoothFactorBg);
02715                         weightedSumBg += weight * zones[k].background;
02716                         weightedSumDenom += weight; 
02717                 }
02718                 if (weightedSumDenom != 0.0f)
02719                 {
02720                         background = weightedSumBg / weightedSumDenom;
02721                 }
02722                 bkg = background;
02723         }
02724 
02725         return bkg;
02726 }
02727 
02728 //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
02729 
02730 void CExpressionAlgorithmImplementation::ComputeAvgMaxMinStdBgNoise
02731 (
02732         vector<vector<FloatPair> > & BG, 
02733         vector<vector<FloatPair> > & Noise
02734 )
02735 {
02736         float maxBg = 0.0f;
02737         float minBg = 0.0f;
02738         float avgBg = 0.0f;
02739         float stddevBg = 0.0f;
02740         float maxNoise = 0.0f;
02741         float minNoise = 0.0f;
02742         float avgNoise = 0.0f;
02743         float stddevNoise = 0.0f;
02744 
02745         vector<float> bgList;
02746         vector<float> noiseList;
02747         int count=0;
02748 
02749         int UnitsPerChip = m_Cdf.GetHeader().GetNumProbeSets();
02750         for (int iUnit=0; iUnit<UnitsPerChip; iUnit++)
02751         {
02752                 int nAtoms = (int) BG[iUnit].size();
02753                 bgList.resize(count + nAtoms * 2);
02754                 noiseList.resize(count + nAtoms * 2);
02755                 for (int iAtom=0; iAtom<nAtoms; iAtom++)
02756                 {
02757                         bgList[count] = BG[iUnit][iAtom].value1;
02758                         noiseList[count] = Noise[iUnit][iAtom].value1;
02759                         count++;
02760 
02761                         bgList[count] = BG[iUnit][iAtom].value2;
02762                         noiseList[count] = Noise[iUnit][iAtom].value2;
02763                         count++;
02764                 }
02765         }
02766 
02767         // Compute the min/max/avg/stdev values
02768         maxBg = *max_element(bgList.begin(), bgList.end());
02769         minBg = *min_element(bgList.begin(), bgList.end());
02770         maxNoise = *max_element(noiseList.begin(), noiseList.end());
02771         minNoise = *min_element(noiseList.begin(), noiseList.end());
02772         avgBg = mean(bgList);
02773         avgNoise = mean(noiseList);
02774         stddevBg = stddev(bgList);
02775         stddevNoise = stddev(noiseList);
02776 
02777 
02778         // Store the noise stats
02779         m_NoiseStats.avg = avgNoise;
02780         m_NoiseStats.stdv = stddevNoise;
02781         m_NoiseStats.min = minNoise;
02782         m_NoiseStats.max = maxNoise;
02783 
02784 
02785         // Store the background stats
02786         m_BgStats.avg = avgBg;
02787         m_BgStats.stdv = stddevBg;
02788         m_BgStats.min = minBg;
02789         m_BgStats.max = maxBg;
02790 }
02791 
02792 //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
02793 
02794 void CExpressionAlgorithmImplementation::ReportCornerControls(affxcdf::GeneChipQCProbeSetType qcType)
02795 {
02796         // Get the desired qc probe set.
02797         FusionCDFQCProbeSetInformation qcUnit;
02798         m_Cdf.GetQCProbeSetInformation(qcType, qcUnit);
02799         if (qcUnit.GetNumCells() == 0)
02800                 return;
02801 
02802         // Get the average noise.
02803         const float NOISE_FRAC = 0.5f;
02804         float avgNoise = m_NoiseStats.avg * NOISE_FRAC;
02805 
02806         // Compute the average intensity
02807         int size = qcUnit.GetNumCells();
02808         float avgIntensity = 0.0f;
02809         FusionCDFQCProbeInformation qcCell;
02810         for (int iCell=0; iCell<size; iCell++)
02811         {
02812                 qcUnit.GetProbeInformation(iCell, qcCell);
02813                 float fQCBg = ComputeCellBackground(qcCell.GetX(), qcCell.GetY(),
02814                         m_ZonesInfo.pZones, m_ZonesInfo.number_zones, m_Params.SmoothFactorBG);
02815                 float fQCIntensity = m_Cell.GetIntensity(qcCell.GetX(), qcCell.GetY());
02816                 float fDelta = fQCIntensity - fQCBg;
02817                 if (fDelta <= avgNoise)
02818                         avgIntensity += avgNoise;
02819                 else
02820                         avgIntensity += fDelta;
02821         }
02822 
02823         // Compute average intensity.
02824         if (size)
02825         {
02826                 avgIntensity /= size;
02827                 ControlInformationType info;
02828                 info.avg = avgIntensity;
02829                 info.count = size;
02830                 info.qcType = qcType;
02831                 m_ControlInfo.push_back(info);
02832         }
02833 }
